title: Oli mwamufu inho
reference: SDAH 73 – Holy, Holy, Holy
lyrics:
1. Oli mwamufu inho musengwa ghaife
Tu-naghunangankyo tusaake erina lyo
Olimwamufu inho ghakisa ghamaani
Kibumb(a) alifuga ense-nense.

2. Oli mwamufu inho bamalaika
Basuula engule okwetoloola enhandha
(E)nkumi nemitwalo bakusaka bangi
Nga bwenkyali eira kiriba kityo.

3. Oli mwamufu inho (o)lwebibi byaife
Titusobola kukubona na maiso
Olwobwamufu bwo ghazira namuntu
Akufanaana olwobulungi bwo.

4. Oli mwanufu inho, Oli wakitisa
Byokola biboneka kunsi nhimwigulu
 Oli mwanufu inho Ghakisa Ghamani,
Bbaba, Omwana no mwoyo omwamufu.

title: Ka-tukusake
reference: CS 396 – We Praise Thee O God
lyrics:
1. Katu ku-saake (o)lwomwana kimoimo
Yesu (e)yafa ya-zukir(a) alimwigulu

Refrain:
Aleluya Tukusaaka Aleluya Amiina
Aleluya tukusaaka Tughe Amaani go

2. Katu ku-saake (o)lwomwooyo (o)mwamufu-
Atulaga omwana oyo natwakira

3. (E)kitiisa kikyo; omwana wentaama
(E)yatufirira yatunaazaku ebibi

4. Tughe amaani go twidhuz(e) okugonza
Otughe nomyooyo gho ava mwigulu

title: Aghebwe’ kitisa
reference: CH 647 – To God Be the Glory
lyrics:
1. Aghebwe’ kitisa lwebyo byakoze.
Yagonza ensi ati natugha omwana
Yaghayo-bulamu tughone ekibi
Yaigulagho’ lwigi ife twingire

Refrain:
Musengwa asakibwe ensi etughulire.
Musengwa asakibwe twena tusagambe
(O)kubiita mumwana tuje ye baabba.
Tumughe kitis(a) olwebyo byakoze

2. Musayi gwa yesu gwatuzaghula.
Buli amwikiriza ya musubiza
Buli mwononi aikiriz’ omwana.
Esagha yen’yo amusonighe

3. Bikulu bingi’fe byetwegereisa.
Bikulu bingi’fe byatukoleire
Kikulu olwokusanhukira yesu ghakitalo,
nenjira etutuusa.

title: Tusaake Eriina Lya Yesu
reference: CH 156 – All Hail the Power of Jesus’ Name
lyrics:
1. Tusaak(e) Eriina Lya Yesu; Nibamalayika
Mumutwikir(e) Engule Enungi
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga
Mumutwikir(e) Engule Enungi
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga

2. Imw(e) Abaana Bakatonda; Beyaghonhi(a) Ekibi
Mumusaak(e) Oyo; Olw’ekisa Kye
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga
Mumusaak(e) Oyo; Olw’ekisa Kye
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga

3. Buli Kika Mumawanga; Kunsi Yoonayoona
Mumusaak(e) Oyo; Ogh’ekitiisa
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga
Mumusaak(e) Oyo; Ogh’ekitiisa
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga

4. Ife Nibamalayika; Tulimusaakanga
Tulyemb(a) Olwembo; Olw’ekitiisa
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga
Tulyemb(a) Olwembo; Olwense n’ense
Musengwa, Kya—bazinga

title: Sinza Isebantu
reference: CH 75 – O Worship the King
lyrics:
1. Sinza isebantu oghekitiisa Twembe namaaani lwekugonza kwe
Okuva eiraneira natukuuma Yezungulwirwa (e)kitiisa  mwigulu

2. Yemba kukisa n’obukulubwe Ekivaalokye ka-sa-na konka
Ebigadibye bingi bityabuka Mukikunt(a) omungi mweta-mbulira

3. Nayogeraki kukufaayo kwo? Kwakayakana eyo mwibanga
Kukuluula nga kuv(a) eyo munsozi kulioti amadhi a mateefu einho

4. katukwesige If(e) abaan’abensi (O)kusasirakwo kwaluberera
Obuku-mu bwo bungi tibughagho Kibumba’tukuuma a-te~ gha kisa.

title: Ku kyambi Kya kyabazinga
reference: CH 1 – Before Jehovah’s Awful Throne
lyrics:
1. Ku Kyambi Kya Kyabazinga; Imw(e) Amawanga Museete
Mumanhe Nga Katonda Yenka; N’atonda, Nazikiriza

2. N’amaani G(e) Amakologho; Yatukol(a) Ife Mwitosi
Era Bwetwaghata Ng(a) Entaama; Yatunoonhia Yatwiiz(a) Eka

3. Tulyemb(a) Enhemb(o) Edh’okusaaka; Mumamiro Agamaani
Munhimi Dhoonadoon(a) Edh’ensi; Tulimusaakanga Yesu

4. (E)biragiro Bye Bikologho; Okugonza Kwe Kw’amaani
(A)mazima ge Galyooti Lubaale; Galibaagho Ense N’ense

title: Katonda N’engabo Yaife
reference: CH 81 – O God Our Help
lyrics:
1. Katonda N’engabo Yaife; N’eisuubi Buliidho
Obulumukiro Bwaife; Ebyanda N’ebyanda

2. Ku Kyambi Ky(o) Ighe Musengwa; Tufuna Eidhembe
Omukono Gw(o) Ogw’amaani; Gutugh(a) Obukuumi

3. Katonda Ghaife Waligho; Okuv(a) Eira Neira
Er(a) Osigala Katonda; Ebyanda N’ebyanda

4. Emyaak(a) Olukumi Kwiighe; Giryooti Lunaku
Giringa Saagh(a) Etambul(a) Enduba Yaboneka

5. Katonda N’engabo Yaife; N’eisuubi Buliidho
(O)tugalagenga Buliidho; Tufun(e) Obwamufu.

title: Idha Mulokozi
reference: CS 31 – O Hear My Cry
lyrics:
1. Ghulira okugegenga kwange idha’mulokozi
Bulamu bwange bukwegombainho idha mulokozi

Refrain:
Ndagiradagira eyo munsozi eghala okuva eka
Otwale mulisibo mperrano idhamulokozi

2. Nzira ghakuja kughumulira idha mulokozi
Bwonaningaku ghaire lulala, nafuna bulamu.

3. Lugendo lwange lunkoyiza inho idha mulokozi
Kamwenhumwenhu ko kansanhusa idha mulokozi

4. Toleka mwoyo ogumenhike idha mulokozi
Kulira nokusaba bighulire idha mulokozi

title: Kyabazinga ghange
reference: CH 71 – My Maker and My King
lyrics:
1. Kyabazinga ghange omutonzi ghange.
Ebyange byonabyona mbighayo eyo yali.
Ebyange byonabyona mbighayo eyo yali.

2. Nze ndi kitonde kyo ighe bulamu bwange.
Kibumba ghange nakughaki kwebyo byoyenda?
Kibumba ghange nakughaki kwebyo byoyenda?

3. Byonabyona bibyo okuv’era neira
Okugoza kwo kwenda omutim(a) Ogwebaza.
Okugoza kwo kwenda omutim(a) Ogwebaza.

4. Lek’omwoyo gwange gwidure amanigo.
Ebintu byanga byonabyona bibenga bibyo.
Ebintu byanga byonabyona bibenga bibyo.

title: Ensulo eyomukisa
reference: CH 291 – Come Thou Fount
lyrics:
1. Ensulo e-yomukisa ndheges(a) oku kwembera
Nhembenga’okusasira kwo nekis(a) ekitaghagho
Nsomesa o-ku-ku-sa-ka  ondag(e) obulungi bwo
Oidhuze o-mwoyo gwange eisanhu neisuubi eryo

2. Baabba ndhidha kumpi gholi neghemb’okuyamba kwo
Nga ndi-ne isuubi eryo kwidha ntuuke yoli mwigulu
Yesu yaidha okunonia nze nga nvire mungira ye
Yaidh(a) okunazaku ebibi yafuk’omusayi gwe

3. Yasasul(a) eibandha lyange, kyampaliriz(a) okuba
Olwobulungi bwo yesu kankunhwerere ngaku
Yesu ndobe kukuvaku nga mpabira yenava
Mwoyo gwange ogunhweze gulob(e) okukuvaku

title: Boonaboona Bamwembere
reference: CS 288 – Blessed Be the Name
lyrics:
1. Boonaboona Bamwembere; Asaakibwenga Musengwa.
Aghebwenga Ekitiisa; Asaakibwenga Musengwa.

Refrain:
Asaakibwenga,  Asaakibwenga,  Asaakibwenga Musengwa
Asaakibwenga,  Asaakibwenga,  Asaakibwenga Musengwa

2. Yesu Natolagh(o) Okutya; Asaakibwenga Musengwa.
Aleeta Okusagamba; Asaakibwenga Musengwa

3. Amanhiangula Ekibi; Asaakibwenga Musengwa
(O)musaayi gwe Gutunaaza; Asaakibwenga Musengwa

title: Tumusake Avamu enkabi
reference: CH 683 – Praise God from Whom
lyrics:
Tumusake Avamu enkabi,
ebitonde bimusaake
Ebyomwigulu ni kunsi
Baab(a) omwan’ate nomwoyo
Amina

title: Yesu Idha Otughe Kumikisajo
reference: CH 602 – Jesus Thou Hast Promised
lyrics:
1. Bwe-tuba ababiri oba basatu mulina lya yesu  nga tukungaine
Anabanga nife bweyasubiza Buti tukweghemba idh’obe nife.

Refrain:
Yesu idha otughe kumikisajo tu-kusa-ba oidhe Otuse-teku

2. Yesu watwagaana mu naku edheira aye tukwetaga idh(a) obe nife,
Kutuusa lwolidha omulokozi (o)twoleke kisakyo tukikusabye.

3. Erobozi lyaife Idh’olirongose Bwetuba nga twemba Tukusanhuse
Kwikiriza kwaife kwiremu Amani Kwenda kwaife yoli kubonekenga.

title: Kantambule nighe yesu
reference: CH 39 – O Let Me Walk with Thee
lyrics:
1. Kantambule nighe yesu nga’ enok(a) eira bweyakola
Ngema kumukono gwange gunwerezenga mugugwo
Engiranga embuzeku yesu kantambule nighe.

2. Tisobola kuja zenka ekisinsi nga kigemye
Nibwebateg(a) emitego nga batudhu bali agho
Ghaire mbita mumasiira aye kantambule nighe

3. Leka nfirwe ebyensieno ngontaire mu makonogo
Nobugumu nobuzira ngangemye ebenderayo
Ndituuk’eyo mu sioni aye kantambule nighe

title: Musengwa Yes(u) Alifuga
reference: NAH 190 – Jesus Shall Reign
lyrics:
1. Musengwa Yes(u) Alifuga; Yoonayoon(a) Endhuba Yetuuka
Obwakyabazinga bwe Bulibagho; (O)kumala Byanda Nabyanda

2. Boonaboona Abokunsi; Bembe Olw’okugonza kwe
Abaana Balangenga Obukwenda; N’enkab(i) Edhiri Muliina Lye

3. Enkabi Nhingi Mu Musengwa; Alekula Ab(o)  Abasibe
Abavunhie Abagh(a) Ekiwumul(o); Abadhulirir(a) Abaigusa

4. Ebitonde Ebyokunsi; Bisaakenga Kyabazinga
Bamalayika Mwembenga Enhembo; Ensi Eiremu Amiina

title: Nkwetaaga Ighe Musengwa
reference: CH 578 – Blessed Lord How I Need Thee
lyrics:
1. Nkwetaaga Ighe Musengwa; Nz(e) Omughaf(u) Omutulu
Ngema Ku Mukono Gwange; M(u) Ighe Nfuna Amaani

Refrain:
Buliidho, Bulisaagha; Musengwa Ghange Nkwetaaga
Buliidho, Bulisaagha; Onkuumenga Musengwa

2. Ovaaz(e) Ebivaal(o) Ebyeer(u); Ebyange Bidhwiir(e) Ekibi
Ondhag(e) Obughafu Bwange; Ondidhuz(e) Amaani go

3. M(u) Ighe Nfuna Emiraala; Ghozira Nze Tighanga
Ontambulirenga Kumpi; Nhiigh(e) Omuliikirira

4. Byoonabyoon(a) Ebyomumaiso; Kusagamb(a) Oba Nnaku
K(u) Ighe Kwendyekalangusa; Niighe Ekiwumulo

title: Tinze aye kristo
reference: CH 271 – Not I but Christ
lyrics:
1. Tinze aye kristo ayendebwenga.
Tinze aye kristo aboneke.
Tinze aye Kristo alingirirwenga.
Tinze aye Kristo adhuubenga.

2. Tinze aye Krist(o) amalagh(o) enaku.
Tinze aye atweyaamaziga.
Tinze aye Kristo abeed’emigugu.
Noyo yenka amalaghokutya.

3. Kristo yenka kibonokye kighonia.
Kristo yenka n’oyeyetagibwa.
Kristo yenka n’oy’aleet’ebirungi.
Kristo yenka ateroghozaku.

4. Tinze aye krist’agab’obulamu.
Tinze aye krist’aizaamu amaani.
Kristo yenka omwoyo n’omubiri.
Kristo yenka ogholubeerera.

title: Nga Omusumba Yesu
reference: SDAH 545 – Saviour, Like a Shepherd
lyrics:
1. Ng(a) Omusumba Yes(u) Omulokozi; Otukulemberenga
Tuliireng(a) Ife Mukyaayiro Kyo; Kyotegekeire Ife
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Watugul(a) If(e) Abantu
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Watugul(a) If(e) Abantu

2. Tulibabo Omugonzi Ghaife; Tugalage Buliidho
Otukuumire Mukyayiro kyo; Otwamulek(u) Ebibi
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Ghulira Nga Tusenga
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Ghulira Nga Tusenga

3. Wasubiza Okutwanhiriza; Nga Ghaire Tuli Babi
Olw’ekivunika Kyo Ekingi; Otunaaz(e) If(e) Ababi
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Katwiire Ghooli Baba
Yesu Ghaife Ow’enkabi; Katwiire Ghooli Baba

title: Ku Musalaba Yanfiirira
reference: CS 271 – Down at the Cross

title: Mukama Lwe Lwazi Lwaffe
reference: CH 585 – The Lord’s Our Rock

title: Yesu Tuzze Eri Ggwe
reference: CH 599 – Father, We Come to Thee

title: Ghulira okusaba kwange
reference: CH 559 – Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour
lyrics:
1. Ghulira okusaba kwange tondeka ghano
Nga bwoyet’abantu abandi zeena ndhetebwe

Refrain:
Mulo-ko-zi Ompulirise,
Nga Bwoyeta Abantu Abandi
Tondeka Ghano

2. Leka ndhidh(e) aghalientebe yokusasira.
Nfukamire gholi yesu tominga gholi

3. Busobozibwo mbwesiga nooniamaisogo
Kunsi nani ali kulwange nsasir’oponie

4. Ennsulo yo mwoyo gwange amp’obulamu
Longosa omwoyo gwange igh’alimwigulu.

title: Yesu Gw’oli Ssanyu Lyaffe
reference: CH 154 – Jesus, Thou Joy of Loving Hearts

title: Nga irungi erina lya yesu
reference: CH 150 – How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds
lyrics:
1. Nga irungi erina lya yesu bwemba ndiwulira
Limalaku enaku yange litolagho okutya.

2. Omwoyo ogumenheike ligwiza munteeko
Nemere yomwoyo gwange neri gughumuza

3. Kuliina, kulubaal(e) okwo kwenzimba endhu yange
Mu-oy(o) ebyubugaiga bwange nze mwembitereka

4. Yesu nomwayi antuma obulamu bwange
Engira enkomerero kanembenga kwi ighe

5. Bwemb(a) omunafu-ompa —’maani mumwoyo omukoghu
Bwemba nkulingirira ighe lwenakusakanga.

title: Atikkirwe Engule
reference: CH 162 – Crown Him with Many Crowns

title: Katonda Tusiibule
reference: CH 33 – Lord Dismiss Us with Thy Blessing

title: Ayi Mukama Otuwulire
reference: NAH 325 – Saviour Again to Thy Dear Name

title: Janga ne lina lya yesu
reference: SDAH 474 / CH 523 – Take the Name of Jesus With You
lyrics:
1. Janga ne lina lya ye-su igh(e) omwana ghe naku
Likugh’eisanhu neide-mbe buli ghantu janalyo

Refrain:
Lwamughe-ndo irungi lireet’eisuubi munsi
Lya mughe-ndo irungi waigulu linsanhusa

2. Janga neriina buli-dho ngengabo ekukuuma
Bweghetololw’ebirebo sabanga mulina lwe

3. Eriin’eryo (e)lyamughendo neritwidhuza eisuubi
Ife tulyemba enhembo ngatuli mungalo dhe

4. Katufukamire ghansi kubigerebya yesu
Tulimuvaaza engule lugendo ngalugheire

title: Ggwe Yesu Omulokozi
reference: CH 276 – My Jesus I Love Thee

title: Yesu mukagwa ghange
reference: CH 401 – Jesus Lover of My Soul
lyrics:
1. Yesu mukagwa ghange ka numukire yali
Tondeka nga ndi zenka Mpegheeza omutima
Yesu nkweka omponie (e)bizibuebingiebyensi
Nkuuma nga ndimulamu’myoyo gwange gutwale

2. Nzi-ra bwe-kweko-bundi Si-tul(a) omwoyo gwange
Bwe-adhidhi-rw(a) ebi-zibu Si-gala-ngoli-ninze
Ka-nt(e) obwe-sige bwange mwigh(e) omp(e)-okuyambakwo
Ghe-mbaku-mutwe-gwange ne-kire-mb(a) ekye-kisa

3. Yesu ghe-nkagwe-nenda bi-ngibye-nkufunamu
Agwire-mube-dhegho kya musa azirike
Omulwaire muwonie bitiramu omutulu
Yesu omutukirivu nze ndhidhwire ebibi

4. Yesu aidhwir(e) ekisa sinigha nz(e) omwonooni
Ntukuza namadhigo agalet(a) obulamu
(O)bulamu buva yoli Kantwale bwa bwereere
Idhuz(a) omwoyo gwange ntuuke mubutaghagho

title: Nayemba kukugonza
reference: CH 529 – I Will Sing of Jesus’ Love
lyrics:
1. Nayemba (nayemba) kukugonza
Kwa yesu (kwa yesu) kweyangonza
Eyale (eyale) k’ebyeigulu naidh’afe kulwange

Refrain:
Nayemb’o (nayemb) okugonzakwe
Nga mus (ngamusa) ka bulidho
Eyafa mbe mulamu yangonza kamwembere

2. Yesu ya (yesu ya) lumwa mbegho
Kulumwa (kulumwa) kwe kwamponia
Maziga (maziga) ge gatoonha lwakinze yamponia?

3. Okugo (okugo) nza kwe kungi
Kughula (kughula) okwensi eno
Kujagha (kujagha) igulu eghala Kumpalirizanze

4. Nze njira (nzenzira) kintu kunsi
kyenkola (kyenkola) Nga kirungi
Ekyava (ekyava) ku omukwano gweyanterekera.

title: Nze ndin’olwembo lwenemba
reference: CH 638 – I Have a Song I Love to Sing
lyrics:
1. Nze ndin’olwembo lwenemba olwobulokozi
Olwakyabazinga ghange eyanzaghula nze

Refrain:
Eyanzaghulanze eyanzaghulanze
Nasutang(a) erina lye Eyanzaghulanze
Ekitisa kibenga yali

2. Ndi ni kristo amp’amaani eyanzaghulanze
Okukola ngabye yenda eya nzaghula nze

3. Obudhulizi bwange nze yali bwabwesigwa
Bwemalagho kutya yendi yesu yanzaghula.

4. Antegekeire amaka eyanzaghula nze
Yendityama nga bulidho kuba yandokola.

title: Kumpi Nigholi
reference: CH 390 – Nearer Still Nearer
lyrics:
1. Nseesa kumpi ni gholi Yesu
Kumpiinho Yesu nomutimagwo
Onhwereze mukisibokyo
onkumire akabiWekataidha x2

2. Nseesa kumpi nogholi Yesu ghaire nganzira
Kintu kyenkugha Mpayo omwiyo gwang’omubi
Ogunaaze Ighe nomusayigwo x2

3. Nseesa kumpi nigholi Yesu musengwa nend(a)
Okub(a) oghugho Ndek’emitawan(a) egyomunsi
Namasanhu gonagon’agensi. x2

4. Nseesa kumpi nigholi Yesu nibwendiva
Mubulamwobwensi Nenhwereze mukitiisakyo
Kyendibaamu eyoluberere x2

title: Nkoberaku ebyafayo
reference: CH 534 – Tell Me the Story of Jesus
lyrics:
1. Nkoberaku ebyafayo bighandike ku mwoyo.
Nkobera eky(o) ekisinga,kwebyo byenaghulira.
Nkoberanga bwebayemba bweyalinga azalibwa
Ghaigulu ebeyo ekitiisa ne miraalagye munsi…

Refrain:
Koberaku ebya yesu bimpandike kumwoyo
Nkoberaku ekisinga kwebyo byomunsi muno

2. Bweyalieyo ngasiba eyo yenka mwirungu
(O)lwebibi byaife yaleebwa aye’ate yaghangula
Nkober(a) ebyemirimo gye nokubonabona kwe
Bweyanomwa byeyakubwa nakyayibwa abantu

3. Nkobel(a) ebyomusalaba bwebamukomerera
Bwebamuta mumagombe koba bwaliomulamu
Kugonza muluger(o) olwo kute-gerekekainho
Tyam’oghay(e) ebyamufaku n’eibandalye yaghayo.

title: Nenda okukyogera nti yesu
reference: CH 635 – Redeemed! How I Love to
lyrics:
1. Nend(a) okukyogera nti ye-su yanzaghula namusayi
Olwokusasira kw(e) okungi yaful(a) okuba omwana ghe

Refrain:
Yangul(a) oyo yangula namusai gwe
Yangula oyo yangula namusai gwe

2. Nze ndi musangavu mu yesu tidhinze bwenakyogera
Nolwokusangal’okwo’kungi kunasigala nga munze

3. Bwendhuba ku musengwa ghange ekiseera kyonakyona
Mbawo nga nhenda kumwembera tisobola kusirika.

4. Bwendituuka mukitiisa kye Yesu ghange ndi mubona
Akuuma ebigere bwange ndobe kusobya mungira.

5. Bwendiba ntuuse mumakage oy(o) alimp’engule yange
Ab’omwoyo beyalongosa abalituuka mwigulu.

title: Nalyoka Ne Nkusenga
reference: CH 310 – O Happy Day!

title: Okwagala Kwo Ggwe
reference: CH 142 – Love Divine

title: Nhemb’obukumu bwa Yesu
reference: CH 93 – I Sing the Mighty Power
lyrics:
1. Nhemb’obukumu bwa Yesu eyatagho ensozi.
Edhaidhula mugayandha yakola neigulu
Kanemb(e) olwamagezi ge kasan’okwakanga
Mwezi nemunhenhye byaka kukulagira kwe

2. Nhemb’obulungi bwa Yesu bweyatugh’emere
Yakob(a) ebintu byabagho atenga birungi
Byakitalo byatondebwa buli nze kyembona
Kunsi kwetambulira nze nibwerib’eigulu.

3. Olagir’ebireribyo kikunta yakunta
Ebimuli nebimera biragaamaanigo
Bitonde byogh(a) obulamu nigh(e) obibeezagho…
Bulighenja ghonaghona kibumba ng’oliyo

title: Emikisa Gyo Mukama
reference: CH 208 – Lord I Hear of Showers

title: Idha Ighe Mwoyo
reference: CH 212 – Hover O’er Me, Holy Spirit
lyrics:
1. Idha ighe mwoyo gha Yesu, otyame munze lero,
Odhidhuz(e) obwamufu bwo, idha Yesu ondhidhuze.

Refrain:
Ndhidhuza, ndhidhuza, ndhiduza omwoyogho,
Ndhidhuza omwoy’o mwamufu, Yesu idha ondhidhuze.

2. Omwoyo gh(o) omusasizi, tighanga kukyogera,
Omwoyo gho oyo mwene, gwenenda ondhidhuze.

3. Nze aidwire obunafu, idha omwidhuze munze,
Kyabazing(a) oghokugonza, ndhidhuza omwoyogho.

4. Ondokole, Ontukuze, onaaze omutima,
Gh(a) emiraal(a) omwoyo gwange gunaaze gughumule.

title: Omwoyo Omutukuvu
reference: CH 211 – Holy Spirit, Faithful Guide

title: Omwoyo Owa Katonda
reference: CH 213 – Spirit Divine, Attend Our Prayer

title: Nga kinsanhusa
reference: CH 611 – What a Fellowship

title: Tewali Wa Mukwano
reference: CS 57 – There’s Not a Friend

title: Enjuba Eyaka Ku Ntikko
reference: CH 612 – There Is Sunlight on the Hilltop

title: Bwentyam’agho ghabigere
reference: CH 618 – Sitting at the Feet of Jesus
lyrics:
1. Bwentyam’agho ghabigere bya yesu nga’mpulira;
Ekibonokye kirungi nekinkumira ghali
Bwentyama ghabigere bye, naidhukir(a) ebyabita
Kusasira kwe Kunene kumpangwir’omutima.

2. Bwentyam’agho ghabigere Nz’omubi ampa omukisa
Enaku nebibi byange, Mbireka yesu ghali.
Bwentyam’agho ghabigere mpay’okweghemba kwange
Bulilwenseet’agho ghali Amp’okusasira kwe.

3. Omukisa yesu gumpe nga nkali kuvaghano
Ningirira nekisakyo mbone nikumaisogo.
Yesu omp’omutimagwo gufuul’omutukuvu
Neragenga ndiniyesu ‘butukirivu bwange.

title: Balina Omukisa
reference: CH 432 – Blest Be the Tie

title: Nkwagala Ggwe Ayi Yesu
reference: CS 301 – I Love Thee Better, Lord

title: Nerondeire mukagwa ghange
reference: CH 531 – I’ve Found a Friend
lyrics:
1. Nerondeire mukagwa ghange yanonda ngati-dhi
Yampaluza nokwendakwe ndhighughe yena ghange
Naili nsibibibwa nekibi nemigugha eminhwevu
Ayempegano ndighughe yena mukagwa ghange

2. Nerondeire mukagwa ghange ye yanzaula nze
Tiyampa bulamu bwonka aye ntuke ni yali
Tikalina kyange bwange  ebyange yena bibye
(A)maani mwoyo no’bulamu zeena mbighayo yali

3. Nerondeire mukagwa ghange yaghebw’obukumu
Ankumenga mubizibu antuuse nemiraala
Nengera ekitiisa kye kyandetera eisuubi.
Kankole kanwane ntuke yendiba nemiraala

4. Nerondeire mukagwa ghang’oghekisa muteefu
Mubizibu abudabuda  anwanira entalo.
Tiriva kwo y(o) eyanenda ki ekilitwaghukania?
Bulamu, kufa, magobe tibiritwaghukania

title: Katonda Abeerenga Naawe
reference: CH 35 – God Be With You

title: Yesu Yakakasa Atighange
reference: CH 608 – Blessed Assurance

title: Mpa Ebaibuli
reference: CH 655 – Give Me the Bible
lyrics:
1. Mpa ebaibuli ekitab’ekyesainhu, Kisanhusenga bwemba ntambula,
Kindhakirenga mumirembe emingi, ‘Kuva Yesu lwe yaidh’okunonia.

Refrain:
Baibuli gimpe’ bukwend’ obwak’einho,
Musanagwo gundag’ engira,
Bisubizo na’mateeeka (a)galimu
Binkulembere bwemba ntambula.

2. Mpa ebaibuli omwoyo nga gutiire Ebitisa bwebindhula munze.
Mpa ekigamb’ekyayogerwa Yesu Ghanika ental(a) endage ghali.

3. Mpa ebaibuli endageng(a) enjira Nsobol(e) okulumuk(a) ebyensi eno.
Entaal(a) eyobulokozi eyakenga, Emulikize ng’enjira entuufu.

title: Nsanyuka Okwogera
reference: CH 518 – I Love to Tell the Story

title: Bingi ebigema ku yesu
reference: CS 525 – More About Jesus
lyrics:
1. Bingi ebigema ku yesu Bingi ebyokusasira kwe
Bingi ebyobulokozibwe eyangonza nanfiirira

Refrain:
Yogera ku yesu nobulokozibwe
Bwe yeghayo andokole (o)lwokugonza nanfiirira

2. Omwoy’omwamufu idha ondhegeres’ebya yesu,
Bingi byentaidhi ku yesu fuuk’omusomesa ghange.

3. Mukigamba ekya yesu kindeeta aghali yesu
Buli lugololiro lwe lundeter’okumumanha

4. Bwentegeera ebya yesu ndisikir(a) ebyo bukombe
Ndyonger(a) okub’oghamani mbe mulangira gha yesu

title: Tusige ngamunkyo
reference: CH 621 – Sowing in the Morning
lyrics:
1. Tusige ngamunkyo ensigo dhekiisa.
Neigulu-igul(o) nimumusulo
Ngatute-egabye nge metubitoleyo.
Tuligha mwisanhu nga tuso-mbayo

Refrain:
Ngatuso-mbayo ebinywa-byaaife.
Tulidha mwisanhu ngatuso-mbayo
Ngatuso-mbayo ebinywa-byaaife.
Tulidha mwisanhu ngatuso-mbayo

2. Mukasana-kokya nibigholeze.
Mukisinsi mwona nimukivumbi
(E)kisera kiridha mulimo guvegho.
Tulidha mwisanu nga tusombayo

3. Tujamukudaga Nolwisi Tufiirwa.
Tubamu maziga Tubonabona.
Mulimo ngagugheir(e) alitusangaza.
Tulidha mwisanhu ngatusombayo.

title: Inhulula Abalikufa
reference: CH 623 – Rescue the Perishing

title: Tewewolereza
reference: CS 513 – Ask Not to Be Excused

title: Nze Ndowooza ku Nsi
reference: CH 626 – I am Thinking Today

title: Kola obwire bughayo
reference: CH 446 – Work for the Night is Coming

title: Mugende Mu Nsi Zonna
reference: CH 445 – For My Sake and the Gospel Go

title: Ndi nimukagwa ghange
reference: CH 532 – I Have a Friend So Precious
lyrics:
1. Ndi nimukagwa ghange ghamuwendho yendi
Anenda nokwend’okungi anend’oyo Yesu
Nze tyenda kuvagho ghali nendambe kumpiawo
Tusula nze ni Yesu ngali ninze

2. Olwiisi bwemba nkoye nga mpwoiremu amaani
Ankoba mwesireku oyo nsab(e) okuyambakwe
Mungir(a) omuli akasana ghansi ghendhubaye
Meni tutambula ife ngali ninze

3. Mukoberaku enaku nebinsangaza ebyo
Kiisi ekiba kinsanhiwisa ghaire ekyo’kinhize
Ankobera bwemba nkola ankobangezeku
Twogera nze ni Yesu ngali munze

4. Akiidhi kyenakola nemy(o) eminafu
Ankobanje mbakobere kibono kululwe
Ndhogere nikukwenda kwe kwamutusa okufa
Tukolera ghalala nze ni Yesu.

title: Nkwesiga Yesu Mukama
reference: CH 256 – I Am Trusting Thee (2nd Tune)

title: Bwendowooza Omusalaba
reference: CH 220 – When I Survey the Wondrous Cross

title: Fugha Endeka Omukumi
reference: CH 619 – Watchman, Blow the Gospel Trumpet

title: Abadhasi Ba Yesu
reference: CH 360 – Onward, Christian Soldiers
lyrics:
1. (A)badhasi ba Yesu tukumbe tuje
Mulutalo Yesu ngakulembeire
Krist’omulangira n’omudhumizi
Musete mumaiso nebendera ye

Refrain:
Badhasi ba Yesu tukumbe tuje
Mulutalo Yesu ngakulembeire.

2. Nga eighe erya amaani ife kanisaye
Katunine mu bigere ebyabeira
Nga titwaghukana tube kitole
Ngatuli neisubi ly’obughanguzi

3. Bwetulaga (a)mani g’obughanguzi
Maghe ga Sitani gavagho mbiro
Badhasi ba Yesu twonger’amaani
Twembere ghaigulu balabe batye.

4. Ebitiisa byensi biribulagho
Aye kanisa ye eja mu maiso
Milyang(o) egy’omubi tigisobola
Kusaniagho kisubizo kya Yesu.

5. Mwenamwena mwidhe mutweyimbeku
Twembere ghaigulu olw’obughanguzi
Awebwe ekitisa nga tumusaka
Kyabazinga ogh’ensi katumwembere.

title: Zuukuka Ggwe Mwoyo
reference: CH 355 – Wake My Soul

title: Wekuume Bulijjo
reference: CH 358 – My Soul, Be On Thy Guard

title: Nywereranga Ku Katonda
reference: CS 509 – Firmly Stand for God

title: Omusayi Gwa Yesu Gwonka
reference: CH 581 – My Hope Is Built on Nothing Less
lyrics:
1. (O)musayi gwa Yesu gwonka kwenazimba esuubi lwange
Tidha kwesiga byansi eno kanesibe ku lina lwe.

Refrain:
Kulubaale Yesu ngumye ebyensi eno birighagho
Ebyensi eno birighagho.

2. Enzikiza bwebwika ku maisoge mba mukisakye
Buli kighunga bwaba idha nga negema ku Yesu oyo.

3. Yalaira okukuma mubuli mbeera yansi eno
Buli lwemba mpwamu amaani Yesu neisuubi lyange nze.

4. Mukuvuga kwe ngombe-dhe bwaliba idha andhagane
Nga nvair(e) obutukirivu ngansanira mumaisoge.

title: Mwidhe Abenda Yesu
reference: CH 640 – Come Ye That Love the Lord
lyrics:
1. Mwidh(e) abenda Yesu tumanis’eisanhu
Tweyimbe mukumwmbera tweyimbe mukumwembera
Twtolole ekyambi twetolole entebe

Refrain:
Tuj’eyo mu Sayuni Kirungi, kirungi Sayuni
Tukumba tuja mu Sayuni mwekyo ekiya kya Kibumba

2. Abatenda kwemba ngatibaidhi Yesu.
If’abaana bakyabazinga if(e) abaana bakyabazinga.
Twembere ghaigulu twembere ghaigulu.

3. (O)lusozi Sayuni luvaamu ebighoma
Ngatukali kutuk(a) eyo ngatukali kutuk(a) eyo
Mungudo dha zaabu muguudo dha zaabu

4. Twembere ghaigulu maziga gawewo
Tukumbira ghe Manueli tukumbira ghe Manueli
Munsi eyo ghaigulu, munsi eyo ghaigulu.

title: Ggwe Omukristaayo Tunula
reference: CS 555 – Watch for the Time is Short

title: Twidha Zimba Ku Lubaale
reference: CH 579 – We’ll Build on the Rock
lyrics:
1. Twidha zimba ku lubaale olwo Yesu lubaale olulamu
Okutyabuka ni ki kikunta nga bidhye titulitya

Refrain:
Twida zimb’okwo twidha zimb’okwo
Twidha zimbaku lubaale okwo Yesu Kristo yenka

2. Ghaligho abazimba kubyensi kubirooto byobukoombe
Bandi bazimba ku mucanga kumasanhu gomunsi

3. Zimba kulubaal(e) olweisubi lubaale’lwolubereera
Lwabwesigwa kayi lunhwevu isuubi lyobulokozi.

title: Yesu Kino Kyenjagala
reference: CH 18 – O For a Heart to Praise My God

title: Ighe Omukuumi Nkobera
reference: CH 180 – Watchman, Tell Me
lyrics:
1. Igh(e) Omukuumi nkobera: Obwiire bughaireyo?
(O)bumanhis(o) obwokwiira kwe: Bwainham(e) okuboneka?
Igh(e) omutambuze Bona: Ekimulika Mwigulu
Vaala amagandhula go: Ozuuke Bughaireyo

2. Igh(e) Omukuumi Bona: (O)musana mu ngira yo
(O)bumanhis(o) obwokwiira kwe: Bweyongair(e) okubagho
Endeka lwe lifughiibwa: Erizuusa boona boona
Abamufu ba Kibumba: Nga bambair(e) Ogutafa

3. Bon(a) omusana kamaala: Sabbato Ya dhubiri
Balangeng(a) obukwenda bwe: (O)bwa Kyabazinga Bwiidhie
Lenger(a) eyo mubuntongi: Kanani aika Mukitiisa
Ni Yerusalemi Kiidha : Nga kidhwiir(e) okwaaka kwe

4. Bona Mukiya Kya zaabu: Yesu kw’ikonero lye
Kyabazinga wa Sayuuni: Afuga n’okugonza
Kunsozi-edhekimulika: Obukalamu einho
Emiiga n’ebiyiriro: Okwidhwiir(e) ebimuli

5. Ensi yaife nga eseese: N’ebibal(a) ebirungi
Tulisagambirang(a) omwo: Munhimiro y’adeni
Ghulira enhemb(o) enungi: Mumamiro ag’amaani
Bembera ghalala bati: Tulikumpi-Okutuuka

title: Omusingi Gwaife
reference: CH 255 – How Firm a Foundation
lyrics:
1. Omusingi gwaif(e) abaana ba Musengwa.
Guli mu kwikiriz(a) ekibono kye.
(E)kitukobera buli Kiisi Kyagonza
Leka Yesu-abe-nga Obwaigamo bwo.
Leka Yesu abe Ekikingiriza

2. Totyanga nze ndi niighe mukutopatopa.
Ninze Katonda gho: Ndakuyambanga.
Era Nkugh(e) amaani Oye-merere
Nkugemengaku N’omukon(o) ogwa(a) amaani
Nkugemengaku N’omukon(o) ogwange

3. Ng(a) obita mu masiira a-genhanda.
Mu miiga (e)gyenaku Totya ndhi agho.
Ndhabanga niighe Mumagogol(o) agensi.
Nkwamuleku-ebibi Obe ng(a) oti Mugozi.
Nkwamuleku-ebibi Ob(e) oti Mugozi

4. Bwonabanga-Ighe Mukulebebw(a) okwensi.
(E)kivunika kyange Kikumalenga.
Tikughangenga kukuleetera kabi ighe
Olikughangula ofana-ne zaabu.
Olikughangula ofanane zaabu

5. Ole bwanegemanga Ku Yesu yenka.
Ndhimulwanira Entalo dhe kunsi.
Ghaire mu maani-amabi Age kizikiiza.
Nze Tighangenga Kumulekanga yenka.
Nze Tighangenga Kumule yenka

title: Omwana Gha Yesu
reference: CH 185 – Heir of the Kingdom
lyrics:
1. Omwana gha Yesu lwaki obongoota? Nga tuli kumpi okumpi okutuka
Situuka ghesibe’ byokulwanisa. Yangugha ekiseera kighayo.

2. Omwana gha Yesu lwaki oyengeta? Oyinz(a) oty(a) okelek’ ekirabo
Tolwa yangugha Yesu alikwira. Yangugha kumusangaza nga idha

3. Ensi edhamaani dhiri mukulwana. Dhidhugumira inho olwokutya.
Ghulira tikindi ntisa ya Yesu. Togayaala ighe omwana gha Yesu.

4. Tolwa tolwa buli sagha ensi ekyuka. Bona ekitisa kyayo kighagho
Kutul’ endhegere dha staani edho. Kyuka mangu vayo mwana ghange

5. Ghekalirise neriiso ghaigulu. Obone Yesu mukitis(a) aidha
Ghaigulu kunsozi kasana kaaka. Ighe mwana gha Yesu sanhuka

title: Abakuumi Ba Sayuuni
reference: CH 184 – Watchmen on the Walls of Zion
lyrics:
1. Abakuumi ba Sayuuni: Obwiire bughaireyo?
Emuunienie Eboneka: Bunatera okukya?
Mulengera ekimulika kiidha?
Mulengera ekimulika kiidha?

2. (O)bumanhis(o) obwokwiira kwe: Kungira buboneka?
Tuli kumpi Okutuuka Mukiya Kya Kibumba?
Buli kumpi (O)bwakyabazinga bwaife
Buli kumpi (O)bwakyabazinga bwaife

3. (E)kimulika Kyeyongera: Tulang(e) Obukwenda bwe
Emuunienie tugibona: Ng(a) eyaka ne’kitiisa
Tukyakyankye: (O)bulokozi Buseese
Tukyakyankye: (O)bulokozi Buseese

4. (O)bumanhiso Tububoine: Obulang(a) Okwiira kwe
Tukumbe tujje Mumaiso: N’obukwenda Bwa Yesu
Tumusaake Namamir(o) Agamaani
Tumusaake Namamir(o) Agamaani

title: Olwiiregho Musengwa
reference: CH 354 – How Long, O Lord our Savior? (tune)
lyrics:
1. Olwiiregho Musengwa: Omudhuni ghaife
(E)myoyo ghaife mighafu: olwiiregh(o) okwiira
Olunaku-olwo Lwiidhe: olwekimulika
(E)kitiisa Kyo Kighang(e) okwakiira abantu

2. Olwiiregho Musengwa: Oghekivunika
Tova mu kyayiro kyo: (A)bandi baviiremu
Bajja Mumagogolo: Abandi Ku babo
Ate batono Kwiife Abeteeseteese

3. Ozuuse abantu bo: Batwaal(e) Obukwenda
Era balange bati: “Musengw(a) Alikumpi”
Tadhooba dhaife dhaake: (O)tugh(e) Amaganduula
Kiisi Muntu-akyakyankye: Ng(a) Oidhie Mu Kitiisa.

title: Mp’okwikiriza Okugumu
reference: CH 245 – O For a Faith
lyrics:
1. Mp’okwikiriza okugumu okutasenena.
Ghaire nga nnhigirizibwa ebizibu nga bidhyoe nze ngume
Bwebi-dha ku nze ngume

2. (O)kwe mulugunhia kuvegho ghair€ okuduuduma
Ngandi ghansi ghebinhiga musagha eyo kulumw’okungi
Nhwerere ku Yesu

3. Okwikiriza okutatya okumesamesa
Ghaire nga ghaligho okutya enzikiza ng(a) ege’mye inho kunsi
Ng’egenye inho kusi eno

4. Ghaire nga bansekerera olwokwikiriza
Okudaagadaaga okungi kulobenga kuntoola ku Yesu
Kuntoola nga ku Yesu

5. Kibumba mpa okwikiriza (o)kuly’oti nikuno
Buli ekinaidhanga yendi kinhendese ng(a) okutuuka yoli
Kinhendese nga eka.

title: Abatume abaaligho eira
reference: CH 21 – O For that Flame of Living Fire
lyrics:
1. Abatume abaaligho eira bayasainho omuliro
Bayaghukana ku byensi bagumira ng’ebizibu

2. Gwajagha omuliro’gwo ogwali mw’ibraimu
Ogwamunhwereza kuighe at’ogwakyusa Paulo.

3. Omwoy’omwamufu ogheira yalangirir’okwendakwo
Yatweges’amagira go isaaya ya yolesebwa.

4. Amani ge wagh(e) Eriya esagh’eno tugazira
Kitiisa kyali ku musa yobu yagumikiriza.

5. Idukir(a) enaku edheira ozukize’emyeyo gyaife.
Kisa kyo kibenga mwi’fe fuka kuif(e) omwoyo gwo

title: Ennaku omukaga dhigheire
reference: CH 456 – Another Six Days Work
lyrics:
1. (E)nnaku omukaga dhigheire, Sabbiti yaife einheime,
(O)mwoyo gwange-Ighe Sagamba, Mulunaku Lwa musengwa.

2. Leka Tusaake Musengwa, Eyatugh(a) Ekiwumulo,
(E)kyolunaku Lwa Sabbiti, Olughula Mu musanvu.

3. (O)kwebaza kwaife Kubenga, Akaloosa Mubuntongi,
Ketutoola Ku Musengwa, Oyo Yenka Atudhuna.

4. (E)kighumulo Kya Sabbiti, Kisubiza Emiraala.
Mukanisa Ya Katonda, Litughonhia N’obulumi.

title: Olunaku Olweisanhu
reference: CH 463 – O Day of Rest and Gladness
lyrics:
1. Olu~naku Olweisanhu, e~la olwemilala.
(O)kweralii~kiri~ra Kuwagho, Lwa Kitiisa Inho,
A~ba~ko~mbe N’abaavu, Kwe bamusaakira,
Nga bemba Kubwamufu, obwe byanda n’ebyanda.

2. O~tu~kuuma Mu Kiwunga, Oy(o) Atwetoolola.
Oli nhimi-ro eidhwiire, (A)maadhi G’obulamu,
Otughonhia endhigho, Munsi~enh(o) Eyeirungu
Kulusozi Pisiga, Tulengera eka.

3. (O)Lu~na~ku Lwa~kusagamba, E~ra N’okugonza.
Twi-dhuu-zibwa Ebidhuubo, (E)byo~Bwa Kyabazinga,
Tufuna ekivunika, (E)miraala gya Yesu,
Era Alitututuusa Mundhu Dha~Lata~ghe.

title: Sabbato Nga Enungi
reference: CS 608 – Sweet Sabbath School
lyrics:
1. Olunaku lwasabbato, Olughul(a) edhindi,
Mwoyo gwange gusagamba, kub(a) asasira.

Refrain:
Sabbato nga nungi sabbat(o) ebanungi
Kulunaku lwa sa~bba~to lunaku lwaisanhu

2. Omwoy’ogughankaghanka, Gwafun(a) obulamu,
Ghano nani(a) e~kisinga, nalonda sabato

3. N’omwoyo’gugonza einho yandheta ngye yali
Mulondenga’sig(a) ebindi ebyomunsi muno.

title: Odhuubanga Sabbato
reference: CS 653 – Don’t Forget the Sabbath
lyrics:
1. (O)dhuubanga Sabbato: Gyeyagha enkabi,
Olunaku-olughula edhindi ekitiisa,
Luleet(a) Okuwumula: Neisanhu Lya Yesu,
Lutugh(a) Ekimulii--kilira ekyeigulu.

Refrain:
Twanhirize, Twanhirize Sabbato ya Yesu.
Twanhirize, Twanhirize Sabbat(o) Enhungi.

2. (O)Kuumanga Sabbato: Er(a) omusaakenga.
Eyakob(a) ati, “nhinz(e) engir(a) ey’obulamu”.
Bwetumunonhereza: Omudhuni ghaife,
Alitunhwees(a) amaadhi-Agava Ku Kyambi kye.

3. Ku-olwo olunaku: Tusaaka Musengwa,
Munhembo dha—Yesu Agonza abaana,
N’oy(o) Omudhuni Ghaife: oghekivunika!
Kisuubizo kirung(i) Okuba mu mwoyo gwo.

title: Katonda Atutoire
reference: CH 462 – Safely Through Another Week
lyrics:
1. Katonda atutoire mu sasira eyindi.
Katulindhe enkabidhe dheyasubiza ababe;
Kulunaku olughula mudhindi obulungi,
Olunaku olughula Ki-ghumulo kya yesu.

2. Nga tunonia’kyisa kye kyetufuna mu yesu.
Ngatulag’ amaiso ge atutoleku ekibi;
Ensi yafun(a) edembe lwa kughumula mwighe,
Ensi yafun(a) edembe lwa kughumula mwighe.

3. Bwetunaghuna kunkyo idh’obe kumpi nife.
Tubone ekitisakyo nga twidhye munumbayo,
Twikiriz’okulega kukighumulo kire,
Twikiriz’okulega kukighumulo kire.

4. Engiri ng’ebulirwa eghangul’ omubi.
(E)bibal(a) ebyekisa bighumuz’abakoye;
Tusaake kusabiiti kutus(a)enkomerero,
Kutususa lwetuliba mubwakyabazinga bwe.

title: Twanhirize Sabbato
reference: CH 459 – Welcome, Welcome Day of Rest

title: Nga Kya Ssanyu ku Sabbiiti
reference: CH 458 – How Sweet Upon this Sacred Day
lyrics:
1. Kisagambya Ku Sa~bbato, Olughul(a) edhindi,
Okuleka Ebye-nsi, Twadhuuba Ku-Igulu.

2. Kisagambya Oku-saba, Yesu Yasonhigha,
N’obuvumu Tuye—mba- Inho, “Baab(a) Olimwamufu”.

3. Bisanhusa: Ebi-bono, Byatukoba Ku-olwo,
Bighalula omu-bi, Byamutuusa eka.

4. Tutughanga Kwenaaza bibi, Mumaani Agaife,
Oy(o) abona Mu-mwoyo, Atwooza N’ekisa.

title: Tughe Okugonza Buliidho
reference: CH 42 – New Every Morning

title: Musengwa Kunkyo Ghulira
reference: CH 39 – Lord in the Morning
lyrics:
1. Musengwa Kunkyo Ghulira, Ebibono Byange,
Nga Nkusaba Ompulire, Ighe gwenhingaku.

2. Eyo Mu-Igulu Gye yaja, (O)Kutugholereza,
Nga atuusa egha Baaba, Kiisi Kyestusaba.

3. Omwoyo gho angalage, Mungira entuufu,
Atereez(e) ensambo dhange, N’ebidhuubo Byange.

4. Omuntu Oy(o) akugonza, omugha enkabi,
Ighe Mween(e) Olimwamira, Obeng(a) engabo ye.

title: Omukemi Ya’ngamba
reference: CH 456 – The Tempter to My Soul
lyrics:
1. Omukemi Ankob(a) ati, “Katonda Taghanga Kwamba”,
Musengwa nsa-ba Onsitule; Obenga E-ngabo yange.

2. Mu-sengwa nze bwensaba, ampulira ku kyambi kye,
Yalagira Kiwunga Kunhanda, (A)masiira Gamughulira.

3. Nnambaal(a) era naasituka, Musengw(a) Ompa Obulamu,
Ng(a) ekimulika bwekyaaka kunkyo, Ompenga Okugonza Kwo.

4. Tiityenga Balabe bange, Abanezungulwiire nze,
Musengwa ghenka Nhiighe Adhuna; Ogalaga abantu bo.

title: Beera Nange
reference: CH 50 – Abide with Me
lyrics:
1. Banga Nhinze; Ng(a) Obwiire Buzibye
Mundikiiza Yesu Banga nhinze
Ng(a) abandi Tibaghanga Kunhamba
Ighe omubeez(i) idh(a) Obe nhinze

2. (O)bulamu Bwaife Bughafu inho
Ekitiisa kyabwo nga kighaagho
Ebintu Byensi Kikyuuka kyuuka
Igh(e) agungumala Banga nhinze

3. Kiisi Lunaku Obenga Nhinze
(A)maani go gaghul(a) ago’mulabe
Era nkweghemba Ongalagenga
(E)misana n’obwiir(e) Obenga nhinze

4. Ezira Kyentya Ng(a) Igh(e) Oli nhinze
Kub(a) Onsitulir(a) Omusalaba
(O)kufa n’amagombe mbiwangula
Tiitya Bingegenza nga ndi nhiighe.

title: Obwire bughayo Mangu
reference: CH 51 – Day is Dying in the West
lyrics:
1. (O)bwire bughayo mangu, endhikiza egema,
Yughumule tusaake, (e)byaka byo mughaikendi, nga bwebyaka.

Refrain:
Oli mwamufuinho oli inhebyo odhwire ensi neigulu
Ensi n eigulu bisaka ighe yesu

2. Kibumba ghobulamu, ghansi gheigh’erye igulu,
Kungania abaanabo abanoonia (a)maisogo kukubone.

3. Enaku bwetwidhira, (o)mwoy’omusasizi,
Tufumbatire gholi mukitisa n’ekisa bitulage.

4. Kiseera kirituka (e)ndhuba, (o)mwezi (o)bunhenie,
Birivagho ghetuli malaik(a) atwakire nga bulidho.

title: Endhuba Y’omwoyo gwange
reference: CH 321 – Sun of My Soul
lyrics:
1. Endhuba Y’omwoyo gwange, Ighe Amu~liiki~lira,
Toganh(a) Ebintu~ebyesi, Okuzib(a) Amaiso gange.

2. Ba nhinze Mu Kutendhuka, Ng(a) amaiso gange mazibe,
Ndhuube ku~ighe Mubirooto, Mpumule mu kufuba kyo.

3. Ba nhinze Kiisi Lunaku: Bwondeka nzira gwa nteeri
Obe~nhinz(e) Obwiire Buno, Nkweghemba tondeka zenka

4. Mba kumpi ompe enkabi, Nga ntambulira munsi eno.
Okutuusa lwedituuka, Kunhanda y’endabirwaamu.

title: Ennimiro Zo Zengedde
reference: CH 448 – Far and Near the Fields
lyrics:
1. Kumpi neghala munimiro, kunoga kutuse,
Buligholinga ghonaghona, bibala byerere.

Refrain:
(O)mukulu ghenimiro tuma, banozi bayambe
Bakobe baidhe musagh(a) eno, kisera kighayo.

2. Batume kunkyo nga bwakakya, n’eigulo batume,
Nenduba ngegwa bakobe, banoge buli ghantu.

3. Ghena musengwa ngakutumye, kuleta zabuye
Ekiseera bwekirituka, olisangala inho.

title: EBigheebwayo Bibyo Yesu
reference: NAH 333 – We Give Thee But Thine Own
lyrics:
1. (E)Bigheebwayo Bibyo Yesu, Byoona byoona byeghatugha,
Kiisi kyabukombe Kyaife, Musengwa Niigh(e) Obitugha.

2. Ganha tub(e) abawanika, abatuufu Bewesiga,
Tughenga ebirabo byo, Nga enkabi Dhotughaire.

3. (E)myoyo Gidhwiir(e) ebiwundu, (A)mak(a) agandi nga gazagha,
Abantu beghazaghula, (A)bandi bava mukyayiro.

4. N’omulim(o) Omukologho, Okunonhia abazaagha,
Tubaizenamu amaani, N’okugumya abafiilirwa.

5. Yesu bino byeyakola, (A)basibe Yabagha eidhembe,
Yannoonianga abazaagha; Emiraala yagibagha.

6. Katukole Kiisi kintu, Kyokoba Mu Kibono kyo.
Tugalagire Buliidho, Obenga Mwamizi Ghaife.

title: Ki ekighanga okunaaza?
reference: CH 456 – What Can Wash Away My Sin?
lyrics:
1. Ki ekighang(a) okunaaza? Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka
Kyanamulaku ebibi? Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka

Refrain:
Mukologho inho; (O)gunfuula ng(a) omugozi
Ezirayo Kindi; Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka

2. (O)lwokulongoosebwa Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka
Yansonigha ebibi Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka

3. Ezira Museng(o) ate Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka
Gughula byenkola nze Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka

4. N’eisuubi n’emiraala Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka
Obutuufu bwange nze Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka

5. Aweebwe Ekitiisa; Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka
Era asaakibwenga Musayi gwa Yesu Gwonka.

title: Obulamu Bwange
reference: CH 230 – I Gave My Life for Thee
lyrics:
1. Obulamu bwange nabukugherayo
Musayi gwafukwa Nkowonie mukufa.
Nakugherayo’bulamu Ighe ki kyompairenze?
Nakugherayo’bulamu Ighe ki kyompairenze?

2. Munhumba ya baaba kasaana kwerere.
Ebyo byenaleka Ndhide mbonabone
Nabireka byonabyona, bikiighebyolese?
Nabireka byonabyona, bikiighebyolese?

3. Nabona-bona inho tighanga kwogera
Nagumiikiriza Nkughonie geyena
Nagumila byonabyona ighe ki kyo’gumire?
Nagumila byonabyona ighe ki kyo’gumire ?

title: Idha ye Yesu Ighe Tolwa
reference: RS 123 – Come to the Saviour Make No Delay
lyrics:
1. Idha ye Yesu Ighe Tolwa, (E)kibono kye kigalag(a) engira,
Ayemereire Mwiife leero, Akob(a) ati, “Idha”.

Refrain:
Kinasa-gamby(a) emyoyo gyaife, Ng(a) atutoireku kiisi kibi,
Tuliba N’omudhuni ghaife, Mubwakyabazinga.

2. Mwiidhe Imwe Abatopatopa, Mufune Emiraala Mumyoyo,
Era atu-galagirenga, Mwiidhe Timulwayo.

3. Bw’odhuuba Ng(a) ali niife leero, Ghulira Ekibono kya Yesu,
Ng(a) akweeta olwa leer(o) akoba, “Mwaana ghange Idha”.

title: Mujje Mwenna Abakooye
reference: CH 33(tune) – Come, Ye Sinners, Poor and Wretched
lyrics:
1. Mwiidhe imwe abonooni, Abaghafu-abalwaire.
Yesu-Aligho Okudhuna; N’amaani g’okugonza
Mwenamwena mwiide Mwenamwena mwiide
Na-ghangha yenka okubaghonia

2. Ghaire ebibi byaimwe kamala, Timuty(a) Anabagh(a) eidembe….
Mwenenhie- Leero Asonighe; Bwalagira Musengwa
Omwoyo ghe eidhe Omwoyo ghe eidhe
Abatuku(e) okughul(a) Omugozi

3. Lengera Omwana wa Katonda; Agholerez(a) abantu be
Mumusayi gwe Anabaghonia; Bwemwenenia-ebibi
Mukivunika kye, Mukivunika kye
Ekidhuna kiisi munt(u) eyenhenia

4. Mumusaake- N’okusagamba; Imwe aba-tukuvu
Abali kunsi-N’eyo Mwigulu; Munhemb(o) edh’ekitiisa
Mwembe aleruya, mwembe aleruya
Eri Musengwa Kyabazinga ghaife

title: Ghetegho kulwa yesu
reference: CH 354 – Stand Up! Stand Up for Jesus
lyrics:
1. Ghetegho kulwa yesu ighomulwanighe.
Ghanika bendera ye bulidh’oghangule.
Tuve mukughangulwa tube mubaghanguzi.
Yesu ngakulembeire twidha kughangula.

2. Ghetegho kulwa yesu endeka evuga.
Museete yolutalo kulunaku luno.
Abasaadha mulwane abalabe bangi.
Leka twiremu amaani tughakanio’bubi.

3. Ghetegho ku lwa yesu mumanige gonka.
Tighesiga maanigo ghesige ga yesu.
Vaal(a) ebyokulwanisa omale osabe.
Bwoyetebw(a) olwakabi tolwagho kwiramu.

4. Ghetegho ku lwa yesu tulwanise omubi.
Baghulir’eirobozi ery’obughanzi.
Aghangul’alighebw(a) engule’yo bulamu.
Ife nikyabazinga ghaife tulifuga.

title: Yesu Nobwikakamu Akweta
reference: CH 569 – Jesus is Tenderly Calling Today
lyrics:
1. Yesu nobwikakamu akweta olwabuti oidhe ghali!
Lwaki ova kwoyo akwend(a) atyo ghawabira eyo ewala?

Refrain:
Akweta idha oidhe ghali
Yesu nobwiikakamu alikwet(a) olwabuti.

2. Buli akoy(e) ayend(a) okughumula aidhe yali ate aidhe!
Mangu mumuleter(e) emigugu gyaimwe anabagh’emikisa.

3. Yesu abateeze imwe mwidhe yali olwabuti ategereire!
Mumuletere ebibi byamwe aghali ebigere bye.

4. Yesu yegairir’oghulire erobozi lying’ayeta!
Abo abaikiriz(a) erinalye balisagamba kwolwo.

title: Yesu Ali Ku Luggi
reference: CH 566 – There’s a Stranger at the Door
lyrics:
1. Yesu-Al(i) agho Ku Lwiigi, Muganhe (Angire X2)
Aikaale Mu mwoyo Gwo, Ab(e) omwo (Abe Mu Mwoyo X2)
Yangugh(a) atakuleka; Muganh(e) oy(o) Omwamufu
Yes(u) Omwaana wa Baaba; Muganhe (Angire X2)

2. Igulagh(o) omwoyo gwo, Angire (Igul(a) Omwoyo X2)
Mangu Tolw(a) akuleka, Gwiigule (Muganhe Yesu X2)
Omugonzi gho yenka, Akughe Emiraala
Akukuume Musengwa, Muganhe (Yesu Akukuume X2)

3. Ghulira Akweghemba, Muganhe (Leero Angire X2)
Salagho saagha Dhino, Angire (Salagho Leero X2)
Ayemereire agho; alind(a) Akusagambye
Osaakeng(a) eriina lye, I-kiriza (I-gulagho X2)

4. Yesu N’omugenhi gho; Muganhe (Omugenhi Ghox2)
Akugh(e) ebitepere; Gwiigule (Akuliisenga X2)
Akwamuleku-Ebibi; Mukugonza Kwe Yesu
Alikutwaala eka; muganhe (Akutwaal(e) Eka)

title: N’ekivunika Yesu Ayeta
reference: CH 563 – Softly and Tenderly

title: Musengwa Yesu Yankoba
reference: CH 226 – I Heard the Voice of Jesus Say
lyrics:
1. Musengwa Yesu yankoba, “Idha oghumule;
Ikaala ote omutwe gwo, mukifuba kyange.”
Era naseeta we yali, nga nkooye n’enaku,
Nafuna ekiwumulo, era ansagambya.

2. Musengwa Yesu yankoba, “Bona, nkug(a) amaadi;
Agamalagho endigho; Nhwaak(u) obe mulamu.”
Naseeta ghaal(i) era nanwa, kumwig(a) omulamu,
Endigho yange yawagho; buti ndimulamu.

3. Musengwa Yesu yankoba, “Ninz(e) ayakir(a) ensi;
Ningirir(a) ighe oghang(e) okubona buliidho.”
Namulingak(u) era yaba, enduba yange nze,
Era kantambule naye, paka lwendiiyuka.

title: Yesu omwayi akugonza
reference: CH 572 – Jesus the Loving Shepherd
lyrics:
1. Yesu omwayi akugonza alikukwet’ oidhe;
Oingire mukisiibo omwo mwoghumulira.
Idha ng’okalimu amaani ngate okali muto,
Ingira mukisibo kye mungir(a) eyamazima.

Refrain:
Mubwikakamu Yesu alikweta,
Atangatanga oidhe Yesu ghali;
Mubona Yesu yagairira,
Yesu omusumba ghaife.

2. Yesu omwayi akugonza yaghayo obulamu;
Nobwikakam’akweta’yabula oidhe eka.
Totegeka bikwidha, Musumb’akweet’ oidhe,
Oigire mukisibo kye funa ekighumulo.

3. Tolwa aye idha mangu misege mingi inho;
Eginonia etaama edh(o) enkulu no buto.
Yesu musengwa akwenda, oidhe mukisibo;
Yesu alikweta idha mangu, mundhu eye miraala.

title: Omwoyo omwamufu
reference: CH 228 – Almost Persuaded
lyrics:
1. (O)mwoy(o) omwamufu; ankob(a) ati…
Mbuze katono mwikirize…
Aye nze mwiramu; jja Mwoyo mwamufu,
Oliir(a) olundi; lwendi… kweeta.

2. (O)mwoy(o) omwamufu; ankob(a) ati…
“Idh(a) olwaleer(o) obutairayo…
Yesu alikweeta; nibamalayika,
Nga basaba bati; (O)mwono… n(i) idha.”

3. (O)mwoy(o) omwamufu; ankob(a) ati…
Akaghozima tikadhunia…
Er(a) oba toghanga; kasulir(a) irala,
Era n’okulira; n’okufirwa.

title: Ghulira yesu alikweta
reference: CH 447 – Hark! the Voice of Jesus Calling
lyrics:
1. Ghulira Yesu alikweta naniagya akole;
Ebibalabyenze bingi biteze kunogebwa.
Musengwa alwir’atweta enkemb(a) atugha nene;
Nani amwiramu neisanhu ndighano Yesu ntuma.

2. Nga tosobola kuj’eyo mugayandha aganene,
Kunoniay(o) abatamwidhi kober(a) abalio kumpi.
Ngozira bigambo bingi kufaanana Paulo,
Bakober’okugonza kwe nga bwe yafa kulwaife.

3. Ghaire nga toil mukuumi alieyo kusioni,
Alagirira engira etuuk(a)eyo mwigulu.
Deberera mukusaba okulokola abantu,
Oidhakub’oti aloni kugemerera musa.

4. Ng’emyoyo gizikirira musengwa akwetayo,
Toganha muntu aghulire ng’okob’oti tighanga.
Kol(a) omulimo neisanhu kugubengaisanhulyo,
Mwiremu bwabanga akwese ndighano Yesu ntuuma.

title: Tughulire ekyeisanhu
reference: CH 637 – We Have Heard a Joyful Sound
lyrics:
1. Tughulire ekyeisanhu Yesu alokola,
Mukimanhis’abantu nti Yesu alokola;
Ensi mu dhimanhise Musonzi nimunhandha,
Yesu atulagira bangi balokoke.

2. Mukikunta imwe mwembe nti Yesu alokola,
Mukober(e) abonooni musi edheghala;
Mubizinga imwe mwembe mugayandh’aganene,
Ekidhukizo kyaife Yesu alokola.

3. Mubizibu muntalo Yesu alokola,
Aligho’lubeerera Yesu alokola;
Mukasirise mwembe mumwoyo mumwembere,
Tulighangul(a) okufa Yesu alokola.

4. Mwibbanga mumwembere nti Yesu alokola,
Ensi dhisagambeinho nti Yesu alokola;
Mumpuku mu mwembeku mwigulu mumwembeku,
Twemb(e)olwo bughanguzi Yesu alokola.

title: Kiisi aghulira
reference: CH 571 – Whosoever Heareth

title: Waligho Olwiigi Olwigule
reference: CH 561 – There Is a Gate That Stands Ajar
lyrics:
1. Waligh(o) Olwiig(i) Olwigule; Mwemboner(a) Ekitiisa
(E)kyomusalaba Gwa Yesu; N’okugonza Kw(e) Okungi

Refrain:
Ekivunika Kye Kyingi: Yaigul(a) Olwigi Kulwange
Mpone (mpone), Mpone (mpone) …; Lwaigulwa Kulwange

2. Olwiig(i) Lwanhiriza; Abanoonhi(a) Okudhunhwa
Abaav(u) era N’abakombe; Lwa kiis(i) Ighanga Kunsi

3. Leka Tulwanhis(e) ekibi; Nga Lukaali Lwigule
Ikiriz(a) Omusalaba; Oligheebwa Engule

4. Nga Tutuse Ku Kyambi Kye; Tuliisa Emigugu
Alituw(a) Engul(e) Enamu; Tulimugong(a) Inho

title: Buti omusagho ali kumpi
reference: CH 530 – The Great Physician Now Is Near
lyrics:
1. Buti omusagho ali kumpi omusasizi yesu
Agha abakoy’eisanhu ghulir(a) eirobozirye

Refrain:
Katwembe enhemb(o) enungi ife aboononi tusaake
Enhemb(o) empomerevu nga demberwa yesu

2. Yesu ighe omwana gwe ntaama ghaghay’obulamu bwo
Eriinalyo limpomera kub’eriina lyo ndyenda.

3. Litolagho enaku yange ghazira liina lindi
Mwoyo gwange gusangamba bwegughulira yesu.

4. Alidha ng’aleet’engule engule (e)bulamu
Tulityama kumpi ghali tughaye nga bweyaidha.

title: Omughafu era akooye
reference: CH 341 – Art Thou Weary, Art Thou Languid?
lyrics:
1. Omughafu er(a) akooye; Ozira Maani?
Yes(u) akweta; Akugh(e) Ekiwumulo

2. Alina Obumanhis(o) Obumundholeka?
(E)biwundu Mungalodhe N’ebigere

3. Ki Ekirag(a) amaani G’obulangira bwe?
Ayambaire Engule Eyamawa

4. Waligho Kyenfuna Bwemba Munonereza?
Kamaala Bagegeng(a) era Banholwa.

5. Bwemba kumpi nhi Musengwa Waligho Kyampa?
Atoolagh(o) Okunholwa Antuus(a) eka

6. Bwemusab(a) Ananhiriz(e) Aghang(a) Okudheema?
Bbe Taghang(a) Akuleka Watuuk(a) Eka..

7. Okumunoneraza Kulimu enkabi?
(A)balanzi Bakoba Bati N’agh(o) Agho

title: Waliwo Ensulo Ey’omusaayi
reference: CH 163 – There Is a Fountain Filled with Blood
lyrics:
1. Eriy(o)ensulo eyaidula musayi gwa yesu
(A)bononi basul’ebibi omwo banazibwe.
Omwo banazibwe’bibi byibwe batukule
Bononi basula omwo (e)bibi banazibwe

2. Omwibi yasanuka inho kumusalab(a) okwo
Bweyasoniyibw’ebibi omwo yanazibwa
Zena bwembang’oyo anaazaku ebibi byange
Zena bwemba’omubi ngoyo anazaaku ebibi

3. Omusayi gwamughendo yesu gweyafuka
Gwakubagho luberera kulokola ensi
Kutuusa ekanisa yakibumba lweridunwa
Kutuusa ekanisa ye lwelilokolebwa

4. Okuva lwenaikiriza, nabo(a) ebighundu
Nga bikuluul’omkwano nagughayangaku
Lunabanga lwemba lwang(e) okutusa lwendifa
Lunabanga lwembo lwange kutuusa lwendifa

5. Ndikiriza nga bweghaja okutegekera
Ghairenga nze ndi mubinho musayi gwangula
Ndikuba enanga, enanga ey’eyazabu
Ndikuba enanga eyo enanga yazaabu.

title: Musengwa Yesu Nkweghemba
reference: CH 592 – Lord Jesus, I Long to be Perfectly Whole
lyrics:
1. Musengwa Yesu Nkweghemb(a) Ontukuze,
Obenga Mumwoyo Gwange Buliidho,
Menhamenha Kiisi Kibi Ekirimu,
Ntukule Okughula Omugozi.

Refrain:
Ebibi Byange Obyamule
Ntukule Okughula Omugozi

2. Yesu Nhingirira ng(a) Oli Ku Kyambi,
Neghengayo Buliidho Ng(a) Omusengo,
Neghayo zenazena N’ebyo Ebyange,
Ntukule Okughula Omugozi.

3. Musengwa Yesu Nkweghemba Ku Kino,
Nhindirenga Kubigereby(o) Abyatungwa,
Olwokwiikiriza Mbon(a) Omusayi,
Ogunaaza Okughul(a) Omugozi.

4. Musengwa Yesu Bona Nze Nkulinze
Oidhe Ontondem(u) Omwoy(o) Omuyaaka
Ighe Atadheema Abakunoohia
Naaza mbe mwer(u) Okughul(a) Omugozi

title: Njija Ku Musaalaba
reference: CH 600 – I am Coming to the Cross
lyrics:
1. Ndhidha ku musalaba, omunafu omutulu;
Ebyensi ti byendhiku, kyenonia bulokozi.

Nkwesiga ighe yesu nighe omwana gwentama
Kanfukamir(e) aghali’musalab’odokole

2. Eira nali nensoni, edhafuganga munze,
Mulokozi neisanhu, yandeta antukuze.

3. Ebyange kambikughe, emikwano nebyensi,
Omwoyo nomubiri, leka bibenga bibyo.

4. Yesu aidha agwidhuze, (o)mwoy’obutukirivu,
Zeenazeen’anongose, kitiisa kibe yali.

title: Musengwa Nkweghemba Kino
reference: CH 634 – One Thing I of the Lord Desire
lyrics:
1. Musengwa Nkweghemba Kino, (E)ngira dhange (e)mbi Odhibona.
N’amaadho g(o) ob(a) Omuliro, Onaaze Era Ntukule

Refrain:
Onaaze nze Zeenazeena, N’omuliro Omwamufu,
Ontooleku Kiisi Kibi, Obyamule—Obyamule.

2. Ighe Bwomp(a) Okwolekebwa, (O) Mwoyo gwange gulisagamba…
Aye Ekighula Kwebyo, (O)mwoyo gwang(e) Ogutukuze.

3. (O)mwoyo gwange nga Mulungi, Ondholesenga Ebinene
Mbonekem(u) Obulamu bwo, (O) Bwekitiisa, (O) Bwekitiisa.

4. Engi(a) Embi Kangireke; N’ebidhuubo Ebinonoona
Kantambule Niighe Ghenka; Kuba nze Tiri Mulungi

title: Wanaazibwa Mu Musaayi?
reference: CS 88 – Have You Been to Jesus?
lyrics:
1. Wafun(a) amaani ga Yes(u) Aganaaza? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?
Wesiga Ekivunika kya Yesu? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?

Refrain:
Wanaaba (wanaaba) Mumusayi (mumusayi);
Ebivaalo byo byeru ng(a) Omugozi?
Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?

2. Buliidh(o) Engira Ye Mwotambulira? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?
Owumulira Mu Yesu Eyafa? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?

3. Ng(a) Aidi(e) Ebivaalo byo Biriba byeeru? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?
Omwoyo gwo guliba gwetegeike? Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?

4. Tolamu Amagandula g’ekibi; Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?
Waligh(o) Omwiig(a) Ogutukuz(a) Omwoyo; Wanaab(a) Omusayi Gwentaama?

title: Naghaba okuva kuyesu
reference: CH 560 – I’ve Wandered Far Away From God

title: Mpulira Erobozi
reference: CH 527 – I Hear the Saviour Say

title: Awo Ku Musaalaba
reference: CH 595 – Jesus, Keep Me Near the Cross
lyrics:
1. Yesu nkumira kumpi, nomusalaba gwo.
Aghasibuka ensulo dha madhi agaghonia

Refrain:
Mumuti mumuti nekitisa kyange
Kutusa omwoyo gwange lwe guli ghumula

2. Kumpino musalaba omwo ogutya
Gwagan’okusasirwa nomukwano mungi

3. Kumpi no musalaba omwana gwentama
Gundhuna ngata mbula gumpemba nekire

4. Kumpi no musalaba ndha mutegerera
Kutuusa lwendituuka ebutuma mwiga

title: Nz’omukulu wababi
reference: CH 238 – Chief of Sinners
lyrics:
1. Nz’omukulu wababi, kulwange yanfiirira
Yafa nze ntuke yali, yafa nze mbe mulamu.

Refrain:
Nga olusaga kumuti ndighughe yena ghange.

2. Okugonza kwe kungi kuniina waigulu inho
Atekwika ghansiinho kunwerer’ensenense
Kugonza kwanzuula nze ngankali kumuzuula.

3. Ghaire nga nze ndi mubi, ebyange yenabibye
Bingi byenend’abidhi enaku yange yiye.
Mubizibu ebyomunsi bwemba naye tifaayo.

title: Neghaireyo Yesu Yoli
reference: CH 573 – All to Jesus I Surrender
lyrics:
1. Neghaireyo yesu yoli, neghaireyo byaidembe
Nakwesiga nakwendanga gholi ghenaabanga.

Refrain:
Nze neghaireyo, nze neghaireyo
Nze neghaireyoli yesu nze neghaireyo.

2. Neghaireyo yesu yoli nga nfukamira gholi
Nkoye amasanhu agomusi yesu ntwala eyo yoli.

3. Neghaireyo yesu yoli zeena zeena kweghaire
Leka omwoyo gho omwamufu anfuulenze mbe ghugho.

4. Yoli yesu neghaireyo mpulira omuliro gwo
Olwo bulokozibwo yesu oghebwe ekitiisa.

title: Okwikiriza kwange
reference: CH 246 – My Faith Looks Up to Thee
lyrics:
1. Okwikiriza kwange kulingirire ighe
Mulokozi, ghulira bwensaba ntolaku ebibi
Nfuula oghugho okuva olwaleero.

2. Ondhidhuz’ekisa omwoyo munafu
Ghugh’e amaani gukugonze nga ighe eyanfirira
Gwakenga bulidho ngomuliiro.

3. Bwemba ntambulira mubizibu ebingi
Ba mudhuuni ndheya ku amaziga
Tolagho enaku tyenda mpabe nga okuva gholi.

title: Okooye Inho?
reference: SP 118 – Are You Weary? Tell It to Jesus
lyrics:
1. Okooye inho olwebyo ebikuvuna?
Kobera Yesu, kobera Yesu
Ogegenga olweisanh u eryawagho?
Kobera Yesu yenka.

Refrain:
Kobera Yesu, kobera Yesu
Omugonzi gho akwenda
Ezirayo wundi amughula
Kobera Yesu yenka.

2. Ogegenga obutalekera?
Kobera Yesu, kobera Yesu
Olina ebibi ebitamanhiibwa?
Kobera Yesu yenka.

3. Otiire okunholwa kwolina?
Kobera Yesu, kobera Yesu
Era otiire ebinabaagho idho?
Kobera Yesu yenka.

title: Idha Kyabazinga
reference: CH 3 – Come, Thou Almighty King
lyrics:
1. Idha kyabazinga; otuyambe twembe
Tukusaake! Baaba ogh’e ekitiisa
Era omughanguzi; idha ofuge mwife kyabazinga.

2. Idha Yesu ghaife n’omunholo gwo
Tughulire; otughe n’enkabi
Tumanhe ekibono; omwoyo omwamufu ika ku ife.

3. Omwoyo omwamufu idha weyoleke
Musagha eno; ighe ogh’e kitiisa
Tufuge mumyoyo era totuleka, omwamufu.

4. Ighe omukologho osaakibwe nga
Ense n’ense tubone ekitiisa
Ekyo bwakyabazinga ebyanda n’ebyanda mukugonza.

title: Nkwetaaga Bulijjo
reference: NAH 709 – I Need Thee Every Hour
lyrics:
1. Buli sagha nkwenda asing’ekisa
Wazira irobozi eriret’esanhu
Nze nkwendha ighe musengwa sagha yonayona
Buti mp’omukisa gwo ndhidye gholi.

2. Buli sagha nkwenda sigala ghendi
Mpanguza ebirebo bwoba ondikumpi.

3. Buli sagha nkwenda mwisanhu eringi
Oba mukulumwa idha obe kumpi.

4. Buli sagha nkwenda ndhegesa kyoli
Ebisubizobyo bidhuze munze.

title: Nga Emiraala Gindidhwiire
reference: SDAH 530 – When Peace Like a River
lyrics:
1. Nga emiraala gindidhwiire mu mwoyo
Oba nga ndi mukunholwa
Ongalagenga okukobanga nti
Miraala, miraala mu mwoyo.

Refrain:
Miraala, miraala mu mwoyo
Miraala, miraala mu mwoyo.

2. Sitaani bwaleeta okulebebwa kwe
Leka kibenga kya nkabi
Nti Yesu aidhi obughafu bwange
Omusayi gwafukwa ku lwange.

3. Ekidhuubo kino nga kya kitiisa inho
Nti kiisi ekibi kyange
Kyakomelerwa ku musalaba gwe
Musengwa Yesu asaakibwe.

4. Musengwa oleete olunaku lule
Olulyoleka ekitiisa
Ebire bivegho endeka efuuwibwe
Musengwa aliika mu kitiisa.

title: Bwetutambulira Ghalala
reference: CH 582 – When We Walk with the Lord
lyrics:
1. Bwetutambulira ghalala ni Yesu
Mukigambo omusana gwaka
Bwetuba tukola ebyobyaba ayenda
Aba nife bwetumwesuga.

Refrain:
Tumwesige nga tumugondera
Ghazira kintu kindi ekitugha eisanhu.

2. Ghazira ndikiiza, ghazira kitiisa
Byonabyona bivagho ghali
Ensoni dhivagho n’okubuusabuusa
Aba nife bwetumwesiga.

3. Emigugu gyaife egidhwiire enaku
Agitutwikula bulidho
Mukusaalirwa einho bwetufiirwa ebyaife
Yesu alitugha enkemba.

4. Mumukwano omungi tulitambulanga
Ngatwetolola entebeye
Tukole byayenda tuje yatutuma
Nga titutya olwokumwesiga.

title: Ky’eisanhu Okwesiga Yesu
reference: CH 588 – ’Tis So Sweet to Trust in Jesus
lyrics:
1. Ky’eisanhu okwesiga Yesu
N’ekibono kyakoba
Okwesiga byasuubiza
N’okumanha byayenda.

Refrain:
Musengwa Yesu nkwesiga
Nkikakasa buliidho
Yesu, Yesu owe kitiisa
Mpa okugonza nkwesige.

2. Kya nkabi okwesiga Yesu
N’omusayi ogunaaza
Mukwikiriza nazibwa
Mumaadhi agaghonia.

3. Kikalamu okumwesiga
Atwamulaku ebibi
Era atugha obulamu
Eisanhu n’emiraala.

4. Nsagamba okumwesiga
Yesu omudhuni ghaife
Era ndidhi olinhinze
Okutuusa lwaliidha.

title: Yesu Nga Ghamukwano Inho
reference: CH 320 – What a Friend We Have in Jesus
lyrics:
1. Yesu nga ghamukwano inho
Gwamutuusa okwetwika
Ebibi ebyabonooni
Kyamukisa munene.

2. Lwisi tituba naidembe
Lwisi tuba munaku
Byonabyona bidha kuba
Titufayo kusaba.

3. Buzibu oba kulebwa
Bwebiba bitwidhira
Mukagwa ghaife mwesigwa
Yesu aidhiobunafu bwaife.

4. Yesu akali mukagwa gho
Musabe akughulira
Akute mumakono ge
Mwolifunir’eidembe.

title: Yesu Ghange Nze Tibona
reference: CH 332 – Jesus, These Eyes Have Never Seen
lyrics:
1. Yesu ghange nze tibona
Kitiisa kyo ekingi
Olusuubo lugabwiise
Tighanga kubona.

2. Tikubona, tighulira
Atanga oli nhinze
Kuba ighe oba nhinze
Mu kiisi kusaba.

3. Nga bw’oloota ekirooto
Nga tokidhuubyeku
Omwoyo gwange gube kwiighe
Mukusagamba kwo.

4. Ghaire tighanga kubona
Kampumule mwiighe
Nkugonza ighe musengwa
Ensi ekumanhe.

title: Musengwa N’omwayi Ghange
reference: CH 405 – The Lord Is My Shepherd
lyrics:
1. Musengwa n’omwayi ghange
Tidhulirire
Ndya ku isubi eirungi
Era naghumula.

2. Antwala kumaadhi amalavu
Ampa amaani
Andokola mukutopatopa
Mu ngira enungi.

3. Era ni bwemba mu kikonk’o
Ekidhwiire okufa
Ezira kibi kyentyamu
Kuba oli nhinze.

4. Obulungi bwo n’ekivunika
Bibenga ninze
Okutuusa nga ntuuse
Mu bwa kyabazinga.

title: Bwemba Ni Yesu
reference: CH 589 – Anywhere With Jesus
lyrics:
1. Bwemba ni Yesu kisoboka okuja
Ng’ankulembeire ghansi aghensieno
Yesu ghazira nze mbaku enaku
Aye bwaba ninze tiba nakutya.

Refrain:
Yantwala, yantwala tiba nakutya
Nga ndi ni Yesu nja buje yantwala.

2. Abandi basobola okundekagho
Aye Yesu asigala nga ghange
Yesu ghange nenumba yokusaaka.

3. Titya kintu kyonakyona ekitisa
Nkidhi nga Yesu talindeka kuja.

title: Yogera Ni Yesu
reference: CH 603 – Take Time to Be Holy
lyrics:
1. Yogera ni Yesu ngoli mwamufu
Lyang’ ekibonokye nga muli mwembi
Gonzanga abaanabe yamba banafu
Tigherabiranga emikisagye.

2. Ensi eri kughawo ghetukuzenga
Ebiseera bimale ng’olini Yesu
Bwomulingirira omufanane
Bangotini Yesu ni mumpisadho.

3. Lek’akulagenga ebyobwamufu
Munaku oba isanhu ighe nonereza
Akulage ngira mwonabitanga.

4. Ghegenderezenga mubuli mbeera
Mubidhuub(o) ebingi (e)byobulamu bwo
Bwonakulemberwa (o)mwoyo’mwamufu
Akutwale yali omughereze

title: Esawa Eno Yokusaaba
reference: CH 316 – Sweet Hour of Prayer
lyrics:
1. Esawa eno yokusaaba endheta okuva ku byensi
Enkumira mukisibo kumpi nekyambi kya baaba.
Mubiseera ebizibu mwoyo gwange gughumula
Bwe nfukamira nasaba mitego gyo mubi gifa.

2. Esawa eno yokusaba bighawabyo mwenekweka
Nga nteez’okump’emikisa egimpe bw’oyo mwesigwa.
Ngayenda nonie amaisoge nga nesiga ekisakya 
Ebizibu kambimughe muteeg(e)aire mu kusaba

3. Esawa eno yokusaba anhambenga mubizibu 
Kulusozi lwa pisuga ndirengra ey(o) eghaife 
Bwalinvaza obutafa nsituuk(e) amp’ekirabokye 
Bwendiba nj’eyo mwigulu ndisibula ebyensieno

title: Kwata Omukono Gwange
reference: CH 416 – Hold Thou My Hand
lyrics:
1. Ngem(a) Omukono Gwange Omughafu
Tighanga nze Kutambula Zenka
Bwonkalangula Omugonzi ghange Ezira Kintu Kunsi Kintiisa

2. Ngem(a) Omukono Nseete Kumpi ghooli
Aghal(i) Eisuubi N’okusagamba
Ngem(a) Omukono Obutazaaghanga
N’obutava Mungira Y(o) Enungi

3. Ngem(a) Omukono Gwange Munzikiiza 
Nga Tighanga kubon(a)Amaiso go
Mu Kwikiriza Mbon(a) Ekitiisa Kyo
Nayemb(a) Enhembo Mukusagamba

title: Eno Sagha Twegheyo
reference: CH 324 – ‘Tis the Blessed Hour of Prayer
lyrics:
1.Eno sagha twegheyo mumwoyo muteefu 
Tufukamire aghali ekyambi kye 
Bwetuba tumwesiga atugh(a) obukumi 
Mwidhe imwe abakoghu tufukamire ghali

       Eno nesagha eyokumusaba
Mwidhe imwe abakoghu tufukamire ghali 

 2.Eno sagha twegheyo yesu atuli kumpi 
Tumusulir’ebizibu ku bigere
Mumukwan(o) aghulira okusaba kwaife 
Mwidh eimwe abakoghu tufukamire ghali
 
3.Eno sagha tugheyo ebirebo byaife 
Nebigezo tubigh’eriomulokozi 
Mukusaalirw’atwenda naidhi enaku yaife 
Mumutima alumwainho yatumya omwoyo 
 
 4. Musagh(a) eyokusaba katumwikirize 
Emikisa gyetwenda aidha kutugha 
Bwetumwesiga einho bulikibi ekidha 
Aidha kukitoolagho tutambule neidembe

title: Nnaakugoberera Yesu
reference: CH 266 – I Will Follow Thee
lyrics:
1.Nakunonereza yesu buliebyange ghebiba 
Eyo ighe yonabang(a) oja ndhakunonerezanga 
 
Nakunonereza yesu ighe yanzaghula nze 
Ghair(e) abantu banaloba ndhakunonerezanga 
 
2.Ghair’ekigira kibiinho kidhwir(e) amagha mangi 
Mweghasooka okubita ndhakwidha nga nsagamba.
 
3.Ghaire nga nzitoghererwa nga ndaagadaaga nensi 
Nkidhi nga ghabonabona ndhakunonerezanga.
 
4.Nze bwemba ngandi munaku tidha kukulekanga 
Ighe eyali omwavu einho ndha kunonerezanga.
 
5.Ghaire yoludaani entiisa namayeng(o) amangi einho
Igh(e) onakulemberanga nzenakunonereza.

title: Omununuzi ghange
reference: CS 234 – O Jesus My Redeemer
lyrics:
1. Omununuzi ghange olisanhu lyange 
(O)mulokozi ansanhusa munaku yangenze.
 
Yesu olwemba lwange mununuzi ghange 
Ogho mukwano aghula ghazira akwaga.
 
2.Munsi ekoyes(a) eti ighe oli osuubi lyange 
Bwemba mumbeer(a) embi etyo mumazig’amangi. 
 
3. Obwesige bwange nze kambutenga mwighe 
Kuba ighe ghenk’asinga ebiri munsi eno. 
 
4. Okusagamba kwange nga ndi munsi embi 
Nayemba ngankusaaka mundhigi edheigulu.

title: Musengwa Nze Ndina Ebibi
reference: CH 222 – Just as I Am
lyrics:
1.	Mu-sengwa Nze Ndina ebibi;  Olw’ekisa Wanfirira
Er(a) Ondheta Okwiidha Ghooli; Mwaana wa Ki—bumba Ndida.

2.	Nga Nze Bwendi Omu—b(i) Einho; Tigha--nga Na-kwetukuza
(O)musayi Gwo Guna—zenga; Mwaana wa Ki—bumba Ndida.

3.	Nga Nze Bwendi Abusa—busa; Era n’obutakwesiga
Ndidhwiir(e) Oku—tya Mu Mwoyo; Mwaana wa Ki—bumba Ndida.

4.	Ye--su ghange Onhani-riza; Onso—nhigh(e) Ebibi byange
Ndhikiriz(a) Ekisuubizo; Mwaana wa Ki—bumba Ndida.

title: Ghansi Gh’omusalaba
reference: CH 280 – Beneath the Cross of Jesus
lyrics:
1.	Ghansi Gh’omusalaba; Ghenemerera Nze
Guleet(a) Ekikingiriza; (E)kyeibale Eirungi
Gulyooti Endhu Mu-Irungu; Eyabatambuze
Abakooye Omusana; Mwebaghumulira

2.	Okwo Kumusalaba; Mbona Yesu ghange
Eyaf(a) Olw’ebibi byange; Yadaaga Nze Mpone
Era Mu mwoyo neghunhia; Ebintu bibiri
(O)kugonza Kwe Okwandunhia; N’ebibi Byange nze

3.	Kantwal(e) Omusalaba; Ng(a) Ekisulo Kyange
Ezira Kindhi Kyenenda; Aye Amaiso ge
N’okulanga Obukwenda; (O)kumanhisa Yesu
Eyaf(a) Olw’ebibi byange; Ekitiisa Kikye

title: Mpulira Ondheta
reference: CH 224 – I Hear Thy Welcome Voice
lyrics:
1.	Mpulira Ondheta; Musengwa nze ndidhe
Onaaze Mu Musayi Gwo; (O)gwafukwa Kulwange

Musengwa Ndidha! Kandidhe Buti
Naaza Mu Musayi gwo; (O)gwafukwa Kulwange

2.	Ghaire Ndi Mughafu; Ighe Omp(a) Amaani
Onaaze Er(a) Ntukule; Nfanan(e) Omugozi

3.	Oyo Yesu N’andheta; Okumugonzanga
Mbe N’eisuubi N’emiraala; Ghano ni Mwigulu

4.	(O)musayi Gwe gunaaza; Gump(a) Ekivunika
Tumusaakenga Musengwa; Atugha Amaani

title: Ngolola’makono Gange
reference: CH 670 – Father, I Stretch My Hands
lyrics:
1.Ngolola’makono gange nga neghemb’ondune 
Nalumikira eri ani Ba—ba bwona lo—ba?
 
2.Ndikiriza mumwanagho ampenze a maani
Byenegoba byonabyona bighagho mangu inho.
 
3.Mukulugho kwikiriza ningirire kwighe 
Kirab’ ekyomwoyo kimpe Byokinhima nfa nze. 
 
4.Yesu ighe to ndeka kufa yogera nze mbegho 
Nganzira kwe rarikirira bwob(a) oli ghendi. 
 
5.Bwendibona kumaiso go ndisanhuka ntyanze?
Kampulire irobozilyo kutusabwo-li-dha.
 
6.Mpereno nkikiriza nti yesu yanfirira 
Bweyafuk(a) (O)musayigwe nfune nze’idembe.

title: Bwe-Mpulire, Yesu Eroboziryo
reference: CH 594 – I Am Thine, O Lord
lyrics:
1.Bwe-mpulire, yesu eroboziryo.Lindaze okugonza kwo.
A-ye kyenenhenda kub’omwesigwa. Ngandi mumakonogo
 
Nseesa kumpi, kumpinho yesu n’omuti kweghafira 
Nseesa kumpi, kumpi kumpinho gholi 
Aghaliomusayi gwo
 
2.Onwereze mukukunghereza olwamaanigo mwoyo gho 
Eisuubi lyange libenga yoli nkwek’obulamu mwighe 
 
3.Buli lwembanga ndikumpi nighe aghali entebeyo.
Esagha yembanga nfukamire eba yamughendho inho
 
4.Okugonzakwo kwabuzibainho ndikutegeera ntuuse 
Titukangaku kwisanhu eryo lyendiba nalyo eyo

title: Twala ensi ay’ompe yesu
reference: CH 596 – Take the World but Give Me Jesus
lyrics:
1.Twala ensi ay’ompe yesu  ’byensieno tibirwagho
Ay’okwendakwe Kunene kubagho ensenese 
 
Ref 
Ghaigulu nokwika ghansi ghakusa-sir’okungi 
Obukiika nobuleyi bulokozi bwerere
 
2.Twala ensiay(e) ope yesu ampeghez’omutima 
Bwemba ni yesu nga ankumye mukutya nga mwembaku.
 
3.Twala ensi ay’ope yesu andag(e) akamwenhuke 
Ngandi mulugendo lwange musana gundhakira.
 
4.Twala ensi ay’ope yesu nesig’omusalaba
Kutusa maiso namaiso lwegali bonagana.

title: Sirika, Sirika
reference: CH 601 – Be Silent, Be Silent
lyrics:
1.Sirika sirika ghaligho ekyama. 
Sirik’oghulirise kibonokye.
 
(I)dha mpola mpola musegwa alighano.
(I)dha mpola bwoba oseeta ghali
 
2.Sirika sirika kifo kyamufu. 
Wetegeker(e)obukwenda bwa yesu 
   
3.Sirik’ oghurir’ okusaba kwaife.
Tulege kubughomi obwomu Aden.
 
4.Sirika sirika fun’ekisa kye. 
Sirik(a) otegerere musengwa gho.

title: Fuulo’bulamu Bwange
reference: CH 279 – Live Out Thy Life Within Me
lyrics:
1.Fuulo’bulamu bwange yesu oti nobubwo
Obe’ekyokwiramu yesu mwebyo byenkola 
Banga munze yesu mukutambula kwange 
Bwembanga ndhogera babon’ekitiisakyo 
 
2.Nfuula yekaaluy(o) eyanazibwaku ebibi
Lek’ekitiisakyo kibenga kyaka munze 
Ensi k’esirike yesu nga nighe ghenka
(O) mwirugho’ mwesigwa atambulenga nighe. 
 
3.Leka abantubo buli lwobang’obeeta
Babe betegefu kubang’obakozesa 
Bamalirirenga okukugherezanga
Nga tibeganianga ghair(e) okukutengugha
 
4.Ay(e) Obwika’kamu nobutekubiranga 
Nga nteeg’osalegho ngabwenteg’okuntuma
Fuul’obulamu bwange bub’oti nobubwo
Yesu kyabazinga aidhiebibuuzo byange

title: Mukama Onsembeze Gy’oli
reference: CH 632 – Closer to Thee, My Father, Draw Me
lyrics:
1.	Musengwa O-nseese ghooli; Mbe Mu kifuba Kyo
Onhwereze Mu Mikono gyo; Mpumulire Omwo

Onseese Mu Kugonza;          Ontuuse Kwikonero
(Ighe Onseese Mu Kugonza, Ntuuke, Ntuuk(e)eyo Kwikonero) 
Yes(u) Onseese; Kumpi ni ghooli
(Onseese Mu Kugonza, Ntuuk(e)eyo Kwikonero, Ntuuke)

2.	(O)mudhuni ghange Nseesa ghooli; Era Tondekanga
Netolooza Emikono gyo; Onsonigh(e) Ebibi

3.	N’omwoy(o) Omwamufu Onseese; Nze nkufananenga
Onaaze era ontukuze; (O)kughul(a) Omugozi

title: Oyenda Yesu Abe Niighe
reference: CS 58 – Would You Live for Jesus?
lyrics:
1.Oyenda Yes(u) Abe niighe Akutukuze?
Obitenga Na—ye Mungir(a) Entono?
Oyend(a) Akusitulile Ebikuvuna?
Muganh(e) Akugalage

(A)maani ge Gaidha Kukukyuusanga
Musa—yi gwe Gukunaaz(e) Omwoyo
Guli—dhul(a) Okugonza Kwa Yesu
Oli--sagamb(a) Okugalagwa Ye

2.Oyenda Akugh(e) eidemb(e) Omunonereze?
Oyend(a) Emiraa--l(a) Egiva Mwigulu?
Akudhune Mu Bib(i) Obutairamu Kugwa? 
Muganh(e) Akugalage

3.Oyend(a) Okuwumula Mu Bwakyabazinga?
Okukakasa--- Ekisubizo Kye?
Onalanganga Obukwenda Bwe N’amaani?
Muganh(e) Akugalage

title: Buli Kigambo Ekibi
reference: CS 581 – Angry Words, Oh, Let Them Never
lyrics:
1.	Ebibon(o) Eby’obusungu; Mutabyogerang(a) Imwe
Mwekeenenhienga Mu Myoyo; Nga Mukaali Kubyogera

“Mugonzanhienga” Bwakoba yesu
(Mugonzanhie, Yes(u) Akoba)
Tugondere Eiteeka Lya Baba
“Mugonzanhienga” Bwakoba yesu
(Mugonzanhie, Yes(u) Akoba)
Tugonder(e) Ekira—giro 

2.	Okugonza Kwamuf(u) Inho; (O)mukwanho gwa Kitiisa 
Bwetuba Titubifaaku; Ki-reter(a) Okwonoona

3.	Nibwobyogera Mukyama; (E)bidhub(o) Ebibi Biidha
Enkolagana Dha bantu Dhighanga Okumenheka

title: Kyamukisa Ankulembera
reference: CH 393 – He Leadeth Me
lyrics:
1.Kyamukis(a) ankulembera Nebigambo byomwigulu
Buli-ghemba nibyenkola , Asigala ng’ali ninze
 
Antereza antereza nomukono gw(e) antereza
Nafuuk(a) okub(a) omwesigwa  Kuba mwen’oyo antereza
 
2.Lwisi-mbanga ndimunaku Lwiisi mbanga ndimwisanhu
Nimumayeng(o) agenhanda, Asigala ng’alininze
 
3.Nga ye-su angemye mungalo Tiba nakwemulugunhia
Mubyembona ndikaikana Kuba yesu alininze
 
4.Bwendimala emirimo Kunsi kuno nga mpangwire
Ghaire kufa tikuntiisa, Ndisomoka yoludani.

title: Kumpiagho ni yesu
reference: CH 382 – Nearer, My God to Thee
lyrics:
1.Kumpiagho ni yesu ghenabanga, Ghair’omusalaba nga gwidhyegho 
Olwemba lwange nze n’okuba ni yesu. Kumpiagho ni yesu ngalininze 
 
2.Mukanzimyenzimye bwe mba mbuze, Ngenzikiz’egema nga binemye.
Ebirooto byange nokuba ni yesu. Kumpiagho ni yesu ngali ninze.
 
3.Leka noniengira eja yali  Kansab’ekisakye ansasire.
Ba malaika be bansees’agho ghali.  Kumpiagho ni yesu ngali ninze       
 
4.Nibwenakughala nga numwa inho  Nebidhuubo ebingi mu maziga 
Okulira kwange kulivagho ghendi. Kumpiagho ni yesu ngali ninze.
 
5.Ku luy’olweisanhu bwe ndiba nja  Ebyaka mwi gulu mbibitemu.
Er(a) olwemba lwange nokuba ni yesu. Kumpiagho ni yesu ngali ninze.

title: Nze Kyenduuba Kyonka
reference: CS 882 – One Sweetly Solemn Thought
lyrics:
1.	Nze Kyenduuba Kyonka; Bulidho, Bu—lidho 
Ndi kump(i) oku—tuka Eka Mubwa—Kyabazinga

Ndi kump(i) Inho; Ndi kump(i) Inho
Ndi Kump(i) Okutuuk(a) Eka Leero
Eyo Mu Ki—tiisa.

2.	Mu Kiya Kya— Baba; Mulim(u) Endu Kamaala
Kumpi N’ekonero Lya Yesu; N’enha—nd(a) Enkologho

3.	Ndi Kump(i) Oku—j(a) Eka; Nte ghans(i) Ebinvuna
Oku-nholwa Kuli-ghaagho; Namba—le E—ngule

title: Nteekwa mbe n’omulokozi
reference: CS 541 – I Must Have the Saviour With Me
lyrics:
1.Nteekwa mbe n’omulokozi tighanga kuja zenka
Nteekwa mbe kumpiaghoghali atemumakonoge
 
Tityenga lwabulwaire leeka antwale yayenda 
Tidha kutengugha yesu ndhamunonerezanga 
 
2.Leka mbe n’omulokozi ghazira mba munafu
Ezirayo nairobozi erighul(a) ekymakye 
 
3.Leka mbe n’omulokozi mubulamu bwensi eno
Munzikiza nakasana mubizibu neidembe.
 
4.Nteekwa mbe nomulokozi anteku eriiso lye 
Okutusa lwendituuka kumwiga yoludani.

title: Ghonaghona Nga Ntambula
reference: CH 259 – All the Way My Saviour Leads Me
lyrics:
1.Ghonaghona nga ntambula kiki atenze kyenatya?
Naaja nga tibusabuusa (o)lwokub(a) oyo nankuuma 
Amp’eidembe nemiraala (o)lwokwikiriz(a) ankuuma 
Kiisi ekizibu ekimbaku yesu akimalagho 
Kiisi ekizibu ekimbaku yesu akimalagho 
 
2.Ghonaghona ghembanga nja bulingir’ajerula 
Ghaire nibwembanga nkoye andiisa kumereye 
Olwokusasir(a) okungi ampa amadhi agokunhwa 
Agava munsul(o) enungi agaleet’obulamu
Agava munsul(o) enungi agaleet’obulamu 
 
3.Omulokozi abateeze mukugonza kw’okungi 
Yansubiz(a) ekighumulo munhumba egha baaba 
Bwendivazibwa obutafa ndisangalira ghali 
Ndi mwembera ng’ense nense yesu omukumi ghange 
Ndi mwembera ng’ense nense yesu omukumi ghange

title: Ongalagenga Kibumba
reference: SDAH 538 – Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah
lyrics:
1.	Ongalagenga Kibumba; Nga Mbita Muns(i) Enh(o) Embi
Ndimughaf(u) Aye  O—lina; Amaan(i) Ag‘ekitiisa
Ngeemaku N’omukono Gwo; Ondhiise Emere yo
Ondhiise E—mere Yo

2.	Igulagh(o) Ekiyiriro; Eky’amaadh(i) Agaghonhia
Nkulembera N’omuliro; Nga Ndi Mu Kutambula
Omudhuni Oghamaani ; Banga Engabo yanga
Obenga Enga—bo Yange

3.	Nga Ntuuse Ku Yo—ludaani; (O) Kutya Kwange Kuweegho
Okufa Nga Kuziragho; Nga Ntuuse Mu Kanani
Nkusaakenga, Nkusaakenga; Buliidho Nga Nze Nhemba
Buliidho Mu Nhembo Enhungi

title: Kyabazinga Ali Ku Lwiigi
reference: CH 546 – The Coming King
lyrics:
1. Kyabazing(a) Ali Ku Lwiigi; Eyafa Kumusalaba
Air(a) Atwaal(e) Abatukuvu; Aba—tuuse Eka

Ku Lwiigi-----Ku Lwiigi; Musengwa Al(i) Agho Ku Lwiigi
Ali Kwiidha, Ali Kwiidha; Ali Agho Ku Lwiigi

2. Obumanhiso Bulaga; (O)Kuka--ngaaluka Kutuuse
Mangu Tubon(e) Ekitiisa; Kya Bamalayika

3. Muta-lingirira Byansi; (O)Kusagamba N’emiraala
(O)kutuusa Lwaliboneka; Atoolegh(o) Ekibi

4. Muns(i) Empyaak(a) Ey’ekitiisa; Tulib(a) Omwo Ense n’ense
Okufa Titulifanga; Ebyanda N’ebyanda

title: Ghaga ghaty’okutuka eka?
reference: CH 665 – How Far From Home?
lyrics:
1. Ghaga ghaty’okutuka eka? Bwenabuuza omukumi
Yairam ati tuli kumpi okutuka eka
Bwire buli kumpi okuca tereera mu munhenhieyo
Kutuusa bwe tunatuka aghak’omuliro

2. Bwenabuza omukumi ngayemb’olwemb’olweisuubi
Yangumy’ omwoy(o) ati totya lutalo lwangugha
Sirikagho guma nhwera omale omulimo gwo
Kino nkiidhi bwoghangula olifun’engule

3. Bwebabuuza kayi olundi ensi nendhuba byairamu
Kiisi kintu kirivagho Bughangaazi bwidhe
Sirikagho totya guma ‘buboner (o) bwokwidhakwe
Buboneka buli ghantu Engombe eri kumpi

4. Kidhuubo kikala muinho mutambuze talighala
Ngali kumpi okutuuka eka nga mukisa!
Yesu alikumpi okutuuka atweyeku amaziga
Sirikagho tunater(a) okutuuka ye iseife

title: Kya Ssanyu Omutambuze
reference: CH 669 – How Sweet Are the Tidings
lyrics:
1. Kyaisanhu omutambuze okughulira ng’adaagadaaga munsi muno
Mangu manguinho mulokozi aidha mungu alye obwakyabazinga.

Alidha nkidhi ntiaidha mangu Alikwira munsi muno
Ife abakoye tubenga tuja nomulokozi nga aize.

2. (A)magombe gab(o) abaafa eira garibwikuka Bangi kwabo (a)baafa baveyo
Ba-be balamu obutairayo kufa mi-rembe nemirembe.

3. Tu-lyaganan(a) obutairayo kufa Mumaka gaife ago mu Adeni
Twemb(e) enhembo enungi olwobulokozi Nga bwetusaaka musengwa

4. A-leruy(a) amina Twiremu aleruya (A)besigwa tufube tutuuke
Mangu mangu inho mu-lo-kozi aidha A-tuvaaze ebyeru.

title: Imwe Abamufu Mu-bone
reference: CH 549 – Watch Ye Saints
lyrics:
1. Imw(e) Abamufu Mu-bone; Okutengeeta Kw’eigulu
(A)mataala gaimwe Gaakenga; Mwesengeke Yesu Aidha

Bon(a) Aidha; Yesu Aidha. Yesu Aidha Mu Kitiisa.
Afugire Ku Kyambi Kye. Bon(a) Aidha; Yesu Aidha.

2. (E)kisubizo kya Musengwa; Okwamul(a) Ebibi byaife
Alitu—vaaza Engule; Tulange Obukwenda

3. (O)bwakyabazinga Bughaagho; Ghulira Amagaali Ge
Kobang(a) Ekivunika Kye; Ng(a) Endeka Ekafuyibwa

4. Amawanga Ganafwighe; (O)bwakyabazinga Buseese
Kobang(a) Ekivunika Kye; Ng(a) Endeka Ekafuyibwa

5. Abonooni Mwiidhe leero; Ng(a) Akasenga Olwebibi
Ekiseera Kirikumpi; Lwanakob(a) Ati Kighaire

title: Fuugha Endeka
reference: CH 541 – Lift Up the Trumpet
lyrics:
1. Fuugha Endek(a) Evuge N’amaani; Musengw(a) Ali-Kwii-ra
Abatambuze Mwembe N’eisanhu; Yesu Musengwa Aidha

Ali Kwiira, Ali Kwiira Yes(u) Ali Kwiira Mangu

2. Mulange Ku Nsozi N’emitala; Musengw(a) Ali-Kwii-ra
Alidhira Mu Kitiis(a) Ekingi; Yesu Aidha Mang(u) Inho

3. Fuuwira Nhi Ku Nhanda Enene; Yes(u) Ali Kwiira Kunsi
N’aabo-kuluk-l(u) Obakobere; Yesu Musengwa Aidha

4. Entalo kunsi Dhitulaga nti ; Yes(u) Ali Kwiira Kunsi
Kiwunga Nhi Musisi Biraga; Yesu Aidha Mang(u) Inho

5. (A)maghanga Gasungughaire Inho; Yes(u) Ali Kwiira Mangu
(A)magezi g’eyongair(e) Inho Kunsi; Yesu Musengwa Aidha

title: Waligho Eisuubi
reference: CH 379 – There Is a Blessed Hope
lyrics:
1. Wali—gho e—isuubi; Ng(a) era-- Lya Ki—tiisa
Oku—ghul(a) Okusa—gamba; Okw’ensi Kwe—gaba

2. Wali—gh(o) Emu—nhenie; Eyaka Mundhi—kiiza
Eyaka N’eki—tiis(a) Ekingi; Egho—nhi(a) Amagombe

3. Wal—igh(o) Ama—miro; Ago—gera nhinze
Gato—lagh(o) Okubusa—busa; Gamp(a) Okugonza Kwe

4. Musengwa Yesu E-yafa; Aso—nhigh(a) Ebibi
N’emu—nenhie—Etwo—leka; Eisuub(i) Erye—igulu

title: Kighang’okuba kunkyo
reference: CH 536 – It May Be at Morn
lyrics:
1. Kighang’okuba kunkyo inh’obwiire bwakya
Okumesamesa kwabanga kwereere
Yesu olwo nga idha n’ekitiis(a) ekinen(e)
Okutwala beyanunula

Ai yesu olidhali lwetulwemba olwembo
Kristo ghuyo alikwidha aleruy(a)
Amina aleruy’Amina.

2. Kighang(a) okuba mubwir’eyo ghagati
Obwire bufuukemu ekitangaaze
Olwekitiisa kye bwaliba ng’alikwira
Okututwala ek’ababe.

3. Liliba isanhu lyonka nga titukaafa
Ngatitulwala ghair(e) okufiirw’abantu
Alitubisa mubire mukitiisa ekingi
Nga tuja eka

title: Olunaku Olulungi Lujja
reference: CH 547 – The Golden Morning
lyrics:
1. (O)lunak(u) Olw’ekitiisa Luli Kumpi; Yesu Atuuke
Okutwaal(a) Abaana b(e) Aba-mwe-si-ga; Mu maka gaife

(O)kumesamesa N’ekitiis(a) Ekingi; Ku-li-tolagh(o) Obwiire
Amagombe ga-li-manhianguk(a) era; (A)bafu bazuuke

2. Obukwenda Buno Bulangibwenga; Mu Bul(i) Ighanga
Agh(o) Omugole Yesu Eidhe Mang(u) Endek(a) Efuuyibwe

3. Aliidha Nhi Bamalayika Bangi; Eyo Mu Bire
Nga Musengwa Yes(u) Atutwaala eka; Yetutalifa

4. Abagonzi baife Abawumula; Tulibabona
Yes(u) Alibeeya Amaziga Gaibwe; Abagegenga

title: Musengwa Yasubiza
reference: CH 548 – Sweet Promise Is Given

title: Kyabazinga ghaife alidha
reference: CH 189 – Joy to the World
lyrics:
1. Kyabazinga ghaife alidha ensi erimufuna
Lek(a) emyoyo gyaife gimwe tegekere
Ebitonde byensi neigulu leka byembe
Eigulu nensi leka bimwembere.

2. Yesu alidh(a) afuge ensi (e)nhembo dhighulilwe
Bibira nemiga, bibali nensozi
Kabimudhagulize leka bimusagambire
Leka-biremu olwembo lweisanhu

3. Amagha,ne nsiko munsi tibija kwirayo
Kuzisa ensi eno kulumya abantu
Katwembere ghaigulu lekatwembere ghaigulu
Kikoli-mo kiriba kigheiregho.

title: Yesu Musengwa Omudhuni ghange
reference: RS 115 – Jesus My Savior to Bethlehem Came
lyrics:
1. Yesu Musengw(a) Omudhuni ghange;Yazaalibwa Mu Kudhaagadaaga
Nga Lyeghunhiis(a) Erina Lya Yesu; Okwiidh(a) Okunonhia
Okwiidh(a) Anoonhie Nze—Okwiidh(a) Anoonhie Nze---
Nga Lyeghunhiis(a) Erina Lya Yesu; Okwiidh(a) Okunonhia

2. Yes(u) Omudhuni Ku Musalaba; Yansasulir(a) Omusengo gwange
Nga Kyeghunhiisa Kyeyankolera; Okunfiriira nze
Okunfiriira nze— Okunfiriira nze---
Nga Kyeghunhiisa Kyeyankolera; Okunfiriira nze

3. Yes(u) Omdhun(i) Okuv(a) Eira N’eira; Bwenaghat(a) Okuva Mu Kyayiro
Yaidh(a) Azaghule Omwoyo Gwange; Ng(a) Andheta Nje ghaali
Ng(a) Andheta Nje ghaali---Ng(a) Andheta Nje ghaali---
Yaidh(a) Azaghule Omwoyo Gwange; Ng(a) Andheta Nje ghaali

4. Yesu Musengw(a) Aliidha N’ebire; Ekisubizo Ekisanhusa
Ndhimubona Mu Buntongo Ng(a) Eika; Okuntwaala Eka
Okuntwaala Eka--- Okuntwaala Eka---
Ndhimubona Mu Buntongo Ng(a) Eika; Okuntwaala Eka

title: Bwebaliba Beta Amaina
reference: CS 865 – When the Trumpet of the Lord
lyrics:
1. Ekisera kirituka endek’ erifuyibwa.
Obwire buliba nga buviregho
Abalokole ba yesu baliba balondebwa.
Bwebalyet’(a)maina zena ndibagho.

Bwebaliba beta (a)maina bwebaliba bet’amaina
Bwebaliba bet’amaina Bwebaliba bet’amaina ndibayo

2. Obwire nga bukyeire abafu balizukira
Baligaban(a) ekitisa kya yesu
Abalonde ba yesu balikunganira ghali
Bwebalyeta’maina zeena ndibayo.

3. Eigulo nikunkyo leka ife tukole namaani.
Leka twogere nga kumukwanogwe
Olwo ni emirimo gyaifegiribanga gighoire
Bwebalyet’amaina zeena ndibayo.

title: Yesu alisoloza Amaghanga
reference: CH 538 – When Jesus Shall Gather the Nations
lyrics:
1. Yesu alisoloz(a) Amaghanga; (Okuboneka Mu Maiso ge
Ife Tu-lyemere-ra—Tutya; Ng(a) Omu-sango Gughulibwa?

Engaan(o) Aligita Mu Luga—li; Omusinsi Ali—gusula
Ife Tu-lyemere-ra—Tutya; Kulunak(u) Olukologho

2. Tulighulira Yesu Ng(a) Ako—ba; “Omwiir(u) Okoze Bulungi
Oba Tulitya N’okweinami—ra; Tugobwe K(u) Ikonero Lye

3. Alisangaalira Abaana—be; Be-ya-tak(u) Akamanhiso
Alibavaaz(a) Ebivaal(o) Ebye—ru; Bafukamire Ku Kyambi

4. Kale Katulinde Nga Tubo—na; (A)mataala Gaife Gakenga
Omugonzi Gh’omugole Ng(a)—aidhie; Twe-tegeke Okuja Eka

5. (E)myoyo Gyaife Gidhuub(e) Ebyeigu—lu; Nga tuteeg(a) Olunak(u) Olwo
(O)lugendo Lwaife Lweluli—koma; Tughumule Mu Kitiisa

title: Yesu tifaayo ku byabukombe
reference: CH 617 – Lord, I Care Not for Riches
lyrics:
1. Yesu tifaayo ku byabukomb(e) obwensi
Nenda okukakasa nti ntuuka baaba yoli
Mukitabo kyo ekyeru ekyo bwa kyabazinga
Nkoberaku musengwa zeena ghampandiika

Mukitab(o) ekyeru yesu mwota amaina
Nkoberaku musengwa waghandik(a) eryange?

2. Baaba ebibi byange bingi oti muchanga
Aye omusayi gwo gumala bumale
Munuguta endheru mweghasubiriza
Nti ebibi ebikongeire bib(a)oti muzira

3. Mukiy(a) ekyo’kirungi mulimu enimiro
Edhimesames(a) einho dhiriku abakuumi
Ekibi yekitaja kwoona biriyo
Nkoberaku musengwa zeena wampandiika.

title: Esaagha Ey’omusango Etuuse
reference: CH 482 – The Judgement Has Set
lyrics:
1. Esaagha Ey’omusango Etuuse; (E)bitabo Biwumbululwa
Tulyemelera Tutya Kwolwo; Nga Katonda Alamula?

Tulyemeler(a) Ife Tutya; Ku lunak(u) Olukologho
Alibona Nga Tukaabulaku; Oba Nga Tuzira Kibi?

2. Omusango Gwainhama Naab(o) Abafa; Buti Nhiife Tupimibwa
Mu Bitabo Ebyokwidhukiza; N’omuv(a) Ebyo Byasalagho

3. Tulighanga Tutya Olunak(u) Olwo; Ng(a) Ebibi Byaife Byolekwa
(O)mulamuzi Ng(a) Asaz(e) Omusango; Ng(a) Ezir(a) Akugholereza

title: Abayetebwa kumbaga ye
reference: CH 537 – Called to the Feast
lyrics:
1. Abayetebwa kumbaga ye Tube ghalala nabanyube
Tulifayo tutya nze nighe nga isebantu aidhye?

Kwabazinga bwalidha bwaliba ngaidhye
Tulifayo tutya nighe bwaliba ngaidhey.

2. Oy(o) eyafiirira abonooni alidha nengule kumutwe.
Ghalibagho entiisa nneene Bwalibangaidhye.

3. Bingi ife byetukweka abantu birimanhibwa kwolwo ngaidhye
Bakagwa be nabalabe be Balitegeerwa

4. Amaiso agadwiire isanhu galighumulira ku babe
Mungoy’endheru nga dhavaire kwolwo lwalidha.

title: Titwidhi sagha
reference: CH 540 – We Know Not the Hour
lyrics:
1. Titwidhi sagha ya-kwidha kwa musengwa
Obubonero bu-kobaatialikumpi
Ekisuubizo kya-isanhu kyokwidhakwe
(Aye) titwi-dhi sagha

A-lidha---a Tumoge twetegeke
A-lidha---a Aleruya aleru-ya
Alidha nebire (e) byekitisa ekingi
(Aye) titwi-dhi sagha

2. (E)ndhub(a) (a)banoni(a)obulokozi
Mukitabokye mulimu amadhoidho
Agabwikula obukulu bwa yesu
(Aye) titwi-dhi sagha.

3. Katusabe nga nga bwe-tuteeg’okwidhakwe
Tadooba dhaife dhisigale nga dhaka.
Tulimwembera ka-yi tulisagamba
(Aye) Titwi-dhi sagha.

title: Titwidhi Sagha Ghanaidhira
reference: CH 542 – We Know Not the Time
lyrics:
1. Titwidhi sagha ghanaidhira, lwaigulo bwire oba kunkyo
Kisobok’okuba kunkyoinho ob’olyagho nga lwaigulo.
Atukob’okweteekateeka tadoba dhitazikila.
Bwaliba nga atusiza okwidha twena nga tumuteeze inho.

Nga tumuteeze ngatumogainho nga tumuteeze (tumutegerera yesu)

2. Bwendhuuba kukusasirakwe omughendo gweyangula
Bweyav’eyo mukitisakye yadaaga yafa kulwanga.
Olundi kirimusanhus(a) okubona beyafiririira
Nga bacancanca olwokwidha nga bamutegerera inho.

3. Ighe yesu eyanzaghula okidhi nga nze nsagala
Nga ndi neisuubi okukubona ngampulir’okusangaza
Abandi balibabatyainho nga batya okwidha gholi.
Ndiramusa mukagwa ghange obweira gwenateganga.

title: Maiso Ku Maiso Ni Yesu
reference: CH 545 – Face to Face
lyrics:
1. Maiso ku maiso ni yesu tuliringaganaku
Eisanhu liriba litya lwendibona amaisoge

Ndimubona yesu ngaidha eghala eyo mubire
Lunaku nga lwakitiisa lwalidh(a) eyafiirira

2. Olunaku lulikumpi tubon’ekitisa kye
Ekizikiza kivegho tubonagane naye

3. Tulikyakyankya inho kwolwo yesu lwaliboneka
Okunhigibwa kughegho liriba idembe lyonka

4. (E)kisera ekyo kyaghufu inho lwetulimanhagana
Nze n’nomunuzi ghange yesu eyangonza atyo.

title: Tulikungana Kumwiga
reference: CH 555 – Shall We Gather at the River
lyrics:
1. Tulikungana kumwiga ogwamadhi amalavu.
Malayika mweyanina gakulula gha ntebe

Tulikunga ku mwiga agha-li entebe enugi einho
Ngatuli nabamufu kumwiga gukulula gha ntebe

2. Agho kubali kwomwiga gutukula oti feeza
Tulitambula tusinza kulunaku lwesanhu

3. Nga tutuse agho kumwiga twisa agh’enaku yaife.
Omwoy’ omwamuf’einho alituvaza engule

4. Mangu tuliba kumwiga ogumesames’ einho
Lugendo lwaife lukange tumwembere neisanhu

title: Bwendimaliriza Omulimo
reference: CS 849 – When My Lifework Is Ended
lyrics:
1. Bwendima—liriz(a) Omulimo; Ntuuke Ku Kyambi
Nga Mmaz(e) Okufuna Ogutafa
Ndimanha Omudhuni Ghange Nga Ntuuse Ghaali
Alinsangaaza Mwisanhu Ng(a) Amboine

Nze Ndimu—manha Musengwa; Ndyemerera N’omudhunhi Ghange
Nze Ndimu—manha Musengwa; Olw’nkov(u) Edhiri Mungalo Dhe

2. Bwaliidha Mu Kitiisa; Ndibona Ku Maiso ge
N’okumesames(a) Okukologho
(O)mwoyo Gwange Gumusaakeng(a) Olw’okugonza Kwe
Antegeker(a) Endhu; Mu Buntongi

3. Tulibon(a) Abagonzi Baife Abaaghumula
Abazikibwa Mukunholw(a) Okungi
Tulyaganana Nabo Mu Kitiis(a) Eky’eigulu
Okusooka Nze Nhenda Mbone Yesu

4. Mumiryango Egya Zaabu; Nga Nze Nveir(e) Ebyeru
Ndhibit(a) Omwo Nj(e) Ezira Kugegenga
Ndyemb(a) Olwemb(o) Olw’okusagamba Olw’ense N’ense
Okusooka Nze Nhenda Mbone Yesu

title: Bwemba Agho Ku Yoludaani
reference: CH 553 – On Jordan’s Stormy Banks
lyrics:
1. Bwemb(a) Agho Ku Yoludaani; Naghang(a) Okubonha
Kanan(i) Eyo’kusagamba; Neer(i) Obukombe Bwange

Tulighumulir(a) Eyo Mu Kiya (Mu Kiya)
Ekyo’muns(i) Ebutuuma Mwiiga.
Tulyemba Olwemb(o) Olw’omwana we Ntaama
Tube nhi Yesu Buliidho

2. Mubiketezo Byens(i) Eyo; Kitangaala Kyonka
(O)bwa Kyabazinga Bwa Yesu; Atoolagh(o) Endhikiiza

3. Ndituuka Li Mu Kiy(a) Ekyo; Eky’okusagamba?
Ndibon(a) Amaiso Ga Baaba; Mu Bwa Kyaba—zinga Bwe

4. (O)mwoyo gwange Gu-Kya-kya-nkya; Nja Kuva Ghano Nje
Ghair(e) Amasiira G’amaani; Ndighang(a) Okutuuka

title: Omulimo Nga Tugumaze
reference: CS 863 – O There’ll Be Joy
lyrics:
1. Omulimo nga tugumaze Tuliba mwisanhu lyonka
Nga tukukunganire ghaka Nga tuleese’bibala

E—riba y’eisanhu ey(o) eka
Kusanhuka kwonka bulidho
Lunaku luli kumpinho
Tukunganire eghaife

2. Tusubire’nhemb(o) enungi Dhetulyemba nga twebaza
Nga tusaaka kyabazinga Mukibug(a) ekiyaka

3. Eisanhu lye tutegereire Munimiro edhazaabu
Yesu mwene dhategaike Mukibug(a) ekiyaka

title: Waligho Ensi Enungi Einho
reference: CH 551 – There’s a Land That Is Fairer
lyrics:
1. Waligho Ens(i) Enungi Einho; Mukwikiriza Tugibona
Eyo Baaba Gyateegereire; Okututegekel(a) Ebifo
